name: 26 inch EZ Reacher
Description: The 26 inch EZ Reachers with round silicone tips provide a powerful and secure grip with delicate sensitivity. Constructed of lightweight aluminum with a stainless steel spring mechanism for heavy-duty use. The handle is comfortable to hold and has an easy-to-operate pistol grip full finger trigger. EZ Reachers will handle objects of different shapes and sizes up to 5 lbs. The jaws open to 4.5 inches wide. 26 inch model weighs 10 oz. 26 inch EZ Reacher Features: Round silicone tips provide a powerful and secure grip. Constructed of lightweight aluminum. Stainless steel spring mechanism for heavy-duty use. 26 inch EZ Reacher Specifications: Lift objects up to 5 lbs. Jaws open to 4.5 inches wide. 26 inch model weighs 10 oz.
ShortDescription: Jaws open wide!

name: Leg Loop Leg Lift
Description: The Leg Loop Leg Lift allows a person to safely and effectively reposition the leg and foot onto a footrest, a bed, into a car, etc. by providing a more secure grip than merely tugging on a piece of clothing.The Leg Loop™ consists of two loops - a hand loop and a foot loop, one at each end of a rigid middle section. The Leg Loop Leg Lift helps people with limited lower extremity strength lift the leg and foot. It is designed to help people who have medical conditions in which they either partially or completely lose the ability to independently move their leg. Paraplegia, hemiplegia, paraparesis, hip surgery, and knee surgery are fairly common examples.The foot loop stays open until the strap is pulled and then conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip. Rigid middle section allows for easy maneuverability. Once pulled, the loop closes and conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable fit. This, combined with the rigid middle section" he asserts "makes it easier to place on the foot than other leg lifts and reduces the risk of the foot falling out and becoming injured. Leg Loop Leg Lift Specifications: Made of 1 inch (2.54 cm) wide, high strength, nylon webbing. 36 inches (91.4 cm) in length.
ShortDescription: Foot loop conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip.

name: Wedge Cup
Description: The Wedge Cup is an invaluable drinking aid for a wide variety of patients with injuries or those who suffer from dysphagia or other swallowing disorders. This includes patients with limited muscle control or decreased strength, those with weak or limited range of arm or upper body motion, and those recovering from arm or neck injuries. Wedge Cup is the ideal solution for any patient with injuries or swallowing disorders that make drinking difficult. Perfect for healthcare facilities, physicians, physical therapists or individual patients ? Wedge Cup is the best way to help patients drink most any liquid easily and safely. View Wedge Cup product demonstration video. Wedge Cup Features: Works with thickened liquids. Rotating inner liner for either left or right-handed patients. Attractive overall appearance. Safe for home or institutional use. Separate cup insert insulates outer mug. Can be used with hot or cold liquids. Simple snap-together assembly. One-piece lid and drinking spout. Easy disassembly for cleaning. Wedge Cup Specifications: Fully adjustable flow control. Constructed of polypropylene plastic. Microwave safe.
SearchTerms: wedge cup, the wedge cup, swallowing disorders, dysphagia cup, cup for swallowing disorders, cup for dysphagia, for the disabled, handicapped, elderly, seniors, physically impaired
ShortDescription: Drinking aid for patients with swallowing disorders.

name: NoBow ShoeTie
Description: Introducing the NoBow ShoeTie - a simple device! Any lace up shoe can be tied quickly and easily using only one hand! The No Bow Show Tie becomes part of the lacing system of the shoe. As soon as you put your shoes on, it's ready to go. The knot formed is simple, secure and easy to release. No matter the reason to tie your shoe with one hand - the No Bow Shoe Tie is for you! NoBow ShoeTie Features: Any lace up shoe can be tied quickly and easily using only one hand! NoBow ShoeTie Specifications: Color: clear, white, brown, and black. Package: one pair.
ShortDescription: Allows shoes to be tied quickly and easily using only one hand!

name: Lace-Amatic
Description: The Lace-Amatic is the perfect gadget for you if it is difficult for you to lace and tie your shoes every time you go outside. This small two-part plastic mechanism acts as a ratchet to tighten up pre-tied shoes allowing users to slip on their shoe and tighten it up without retying a bow every time. The lace-amatic slips over the shoe's laces and once twisted, it tightens the laces just like tying them.Designed to help people with reduced mobility, the lace-amatic is ideal for people with arthritis, autistics, the elderly, single hand and arm amputees, ALS, MS, Parkinson's, post op hip and knee surgery, pregnancy, stroke, bad backs, overweight and hand or arm joint injury. The lace-amatic can help make bending down to tie their shoes a less difficult task. Lace-Amatic Features: Allows you to slip in and out of laced-up shoes without having to struggle with tight laces and knots. Device does not need a lot of strength or dexterity to operate. Shoes can be tightened and secured with a finger, thumb or the heel of a hand. Ideal for people with arthritis, the elderly, single hand and arm amputees or people recovering from post-operative hip or knee surgery. Lace-Amatic Specifications: Made from strong, clear polycarbonate plastic and is weather-resistant, durable, flexible and non-marking. Weighs only - 11 grams (0.38oz).
ShortDescription: The perfect gadget if it is difficult for you to lace and tie your shoes.

name: Rest Mate Bed Wedge
Description: The curved shape of the Rest Mate Bed Wedge is designed to provide upper body support while lying on back or side. It's wedge shape helps provide total comfort and prevents the body from shifting. Designed with soft polyurethane foam and hypoallergenic fiber fill to allow air circulation. Zippered, removable, machine washable white polyester/cotton cover. Can be used with or without a personal pillow. Rest Mate Bed Wedge Features: Provides total comfort while lying on back or side. Prevents body from shifting. Designed to allow air circulation. Can be used with or without a personal pillow. Rest Mate Bed Wedge Specifications: Size 36" x 24" x 7". Color White. Made from soft polyurethane foam and hypoallergenic fiber fill.
ShortDescription: Designed to provide upper body support while lying on back or side.

name: Jazz Backpack
Description: The Jazz Backpack has a foam-lined back and semi-rigid top that helps hold its shape and structure, making the zippers easier to open and close. It is designed to hang on the back of wheelchairs using web straps that easily adjust to fit most wheelchair seat backs. (Use upper buckle placement for manual wheelchairs; criss cross straps at top and use lower buckles for scooters and power chairs with scooter-type upholstered seat backs.)Front pocket is divided into two roomy compartments - sized to easily hold sport type water bottles. (You can actually get two 1-liter water bottles in each compartment!) Additional front pocket holds small items and has a reflective strip to help ensure visibility. Ring-type zipper pulls are particularly helpful for those with limited hand dexterity.Small web loops at the back, bottom corners may be used to secure the Jazz Backpack to your chair if desired. Also has Velcro-like hook and loop strap at center back that may be used to secure the backpack to the bar of a sport type wheelchair. Jazz Backpack Features: Great for power and manual wheelchairs, with and without push handles, and scooters. Large capacity main compartment has plenty of room for bulky items such as jacket and notebooks. Two interior slash pockets for tucking away smaller items. Jazz Backpack Specifications: Main Compartment - 13.75 x 13.25 x 5.25 inches. Front Pocket - 13.75 x 10.5 x 3.5 inches (has center divider). Made of durable, weather resistant pack-cloth.
ShortDescription: Large capacity has a place for just about everything.
MerchantGroup: Wheelchair Backpacks, Totes, Packs, Bags & Pouches

name: Fleece Wheelchair Poncho
Description: Granny Jo Ponchos are warm, cozy, lightweight, soft, and are longer on the arm than traditional ponchos and call to mind a warm hug. Ponchos are a wonderful upper body wrap for wheelchair users, and are just the thing to put on quickly when feeling a chill.Simple tasks like putting on and taking off a sweater or jacket can present challenges. A poncho that goes on and comes off easily can be a big help.Double stitching surrounding the notch collar and hem is just one of the details that make the new Granny Jo Poncho a warm, welcome addition to any wardrobe. The fleece poncho is soft, warm, and cuddly and full cut.The large/extra large poncho measures 27.5 inches from the neckline to the hem all the way around the poncho.Simple movements related to putting on or taking off a sweater present a challenge for wheelchair or scooter users. A poncho that goes on and comes off easily can be a big help.This Fleece Poncho is ideal for men or women desiring a lightweight warm, shoulder covering while reading or resting. This poncho has attractive double stitching on the hem and neckline, a roomy front pocket and is available in sm/med, and large/x-large for men and women. Fleece Wheelchair Poncho Features: Large, roomy front pocket. Can be put on and taken off easily. Double stitching surrounding the notch collar and hem. Fleece Wheelchair Poncho Specifications: Large/extra large poncho measures 27.5 inches from the neckline to the hem all the way around the poncho. Machine wash and dry.
ShortDescription: A new softer, warmer and fuller poncho that still has a roomy front pocket.

name: Gel Walker Handle Covers
Description: Designed for the ultimate in walker comfort and skin protection! Gel Walker Handle Covers can aid in healing existing sores and/or abrasions. Pair of 5 inch long Gel Walker Hand pads for U shaped walkers. They fit over the side tubes of all brands of traditional walkers. The pads are OPEN at both ends and are applied over the existing hand grips. These are for walkers that have a mostly straight circular grip like found on bicycles and U shaped walkers. Regardless of the covering on the hand grip - they Velcro® over the existing grip. These covers are NOT for use on walkers (rollators) with the wide and unusually shaped orthotic grips. The cover is a chloroprene rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a ?SOLID GEL? and will not leak out. Gel Ovations ™ products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.Do NOT put in clothes dryer. With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. Alternatively, wipe the surface with any normal household soap or cleaning solution that is not irritating and to which you are not allergic. Gel ForeArm Crutch Handle Cover Features: Conforms to the shape of the hard object while simultaneously continuing to provide support. Durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. Covers work best and fit best if put on right over the existing foam pad, handle or grip. Will not harden or soften in the cold or heat. Odorless, colorless and can be ingested without any negative effects. Does not breakdown in water. Gel ForeArm Crutch Handle Cover Specifications: Fits U shaped walkers. Sold as a pair. Material: medical grade silicone, solid polymer polyurethane.
ShortDescription: The ultimate in walker comfort and skin protection!

name: Seat Lift Chair Table
Description: The Seat Lift Chair Table is designed for use with lift chairs, standard recliners, or couches. It features a durable table top that can support a wide variety of activities such as eating, writing, crafts, working on a laptop computer, reading, or playing games. It also features right or left positioning with 180° rotation so that the chair can be placed by any wall and the table top pivots 360° at the touch of a hand. Seat Lift Chair Table Demonstration Video Please specify right vertical post (as displayed in photo); or left vertical post. Table only, chair is not included. Seat Lift Chair Table Features: Designed for use with a lift chair, standard recliner or couch. A built-in magazine rack provides added convenience. Can be used for many activities such as eating, writing, crafts, working on the computer, reading and games. Requires no attachments. Furniture weight secures table in place. Right or left positioning with 180° rotation so that the chair can be placed by any wall. Table top pivots 360° at the touch of a hand. Teak wood grain laminate finish is attractive, easy to clean and scratch resistant. Seat Lift Chair Table Specifications: Tabletop Adjustment Highest: 33inches. name: Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Bed Exercises DVD
Description: Exercise for the bedridden and the physically challenged is designed for people who would like to exercise in the comfort of their own bed. The exercises in this video will help increase energy levels while strengthening muscles and boosting your immune system. Bed exercises include a combination of stretches, light resistance training and meditation. You will learn how to perform several different arm presses, a core workout and lots of exercises to promote flexibility and reduce stiffness. Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Bed Exercises DVD Features: Designed for people who would like to exercise in the comfort of their own bed. Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Bed Exercises DVD Specifications: Run time: 38 minutes.
SearchTerms: chair aerobics for everyone bed exercises dvd, bed exercises dvd, chair aerobics for everyone bed exercises, bed exercises, for the disabled, handicapped, elderly, seniors,  physically impaired

name: Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Chair Yoga DVD
Description: Chair Yoga , from the Chair Aerobics For Everyone Series, is an effective alternative to traditional yoga. This totally seated Yoga workout is easy to follow, and is designed for men and women who are unable to sit on the ground or need to use a chair for stability. It can also be used for people who are inflexible. Chair Yoga will teach you how to release tension, increase circulation and firm/tone your muscles. Chair Yoga focuses on breathing, a central component of yoga and meditation. This video then leads you through a series gentle stretches and easy to perform yoga positions. Incorporating this video into your daily routine will help revitalize the body, mind and spirit. Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Chair Yoga DVD Features: REDUCE STRESS - TONE MUSCLES - INCREASE FLEXIBILITY - PROMOTES GOOD CIRCULATION FOR ALL AGES. Chair Aerobics for Everyone - Chair Yoga DVD Specifications: Run time: 38 minutes.

name: TelAgenda Calender and Photo Display Frame
Description: The TelAgenda Digital Calendar and Photo Display Frame connects by phone line to keep forgetful seniors "on track" by displaying Appointments, Occasions, Medication Schedules and Text Messages on the day of their occurrence. This information is entered by their loved ones on our password-protected website. This is a quick and convenient way for family and friends to convey important information to your loved one from anywhere in the world! The TelAgenda Frame even has its own email address so anyone can email photos directly to the frame.TelAgenda?s mission is to improve the quality of life of Independent Seniors through the daily delivery of critical information from Caregivers.Our team draws from their experiences with Seniors at all stages of life and medical conditions to provide care management products and services that are effective and easy to use.Our website allows Caregivers (Family members, Friends, Care Facilities) the ability to enter and communicate important information that is critical for ongoing daily care and social well being of the independent senior. Schedule information is transmitted by an existing phone line or WiFi (wireless internet) connection on a daily basis and is displayed on an Eye Catching and Easy-to-Read Digital Picture Frame designed for this purpose.Here's how it works: Family and friends just enter their loved one's calendar information and custom messages on the TelAgenda.com website, then the information is automatically transferred to the TelAgenda photo frame over night by standard telephone phone line or WiFi (if available)...your loved one doesn't have to do a thing...no PC or internet is required on their part. There are NO complicated electronics to operate...just plug it in!The TelAgenda Frame includes an annual service plan providing access to the TelAgenda.com website for one year. Renewals for subsequent years are available. Unlimited family and friends have access to the TelAgenda password-protected site to view their loved one's calendar and send messages. TelAgenda Features: Display Daily Reminders Of Personalized Schedule Information Maintained on our Secured Site. Display Messages from Friends & Family. Email Digital Photos to our 8? Digital Frame. No Computer or Internet Required? uses standard phone line to connect daily! TelAgenda Specifications: No Computer or Internet is Required. Connects by phone line. Digital Frame to Display Senior?sSchedule, Messages, and Photos included.
ShortDescription: Helps keep forgetful seniors "on track" by displaying Appointments, Occasions, Medication Schedules and Text Messages on the day of their occurrence.

name: Chair Aerobics for Everyone DVD
Description: Chair Aerobics for Everyone is an effective alternative to conventional exercise if you have never exercised, cannot stand for a prolonged amount of time or are just returning to a fitness routine. Chair Aerobics is also challenging enough for people at higher fitness levels wanting to exercise in limited space, such as at the office. Nikki Glazer has more than 10 years experience as a certified fitness expert. Nikki provides optimal results for the beginner or the most experienced fitness client. By incorporating cardiovascular exercises, weights and circuit training, Nikki shows you how to isolate and tone your muscles without momentum through resisting against our own body weight. We have created a low impact routine to tone and shape your entire body that is fun and effective. Chair Aerobics for Everyone DVD Features: BURN INCHES - TONE YOUR ENTIRE BODY - RESTORE ENERGY - ONLY LIMITED SPACE REQUIRED - FOR ALL AGES. A low impact routine to tone and shape your entire body that is fun and effective. Chair Aerobics for Everyone DVD Specifications: Run time: 38 minutes.

name: Gel Wraps for Swing Away Wheelchair Footrest
Description: Designed to be the ultimate in wheelchair comfort and skin protection! Gel Wraps for Swing Away Wheelchair Footrests provide lower leg protection when using a wheelchair. This pair of gel wheelchair leg wraps can aid in healing existing sores and abrasions. Gel Wraps for leg rests protect wheelchair user's legs that may come in contact with the hard metal of elevating leg rests or footrests. These gel pads fit on the down leg of 70 degree swing-away foot rests and measure 2 1/2 x 9 1/2 inches. Gel Ovations ™ gel is a medical grade silicone solid gel. It does not flow or leak out when cut, will not rot or dry out, does not retain heat, is latex free, and odorless. This gel is highly efficient at distributing pressure, protecting bony prominences and reducing abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. The Gel Ovations cover is a durable neoprene nylon rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material, which is soft and easy to clean.Product Care Information Gel Ovations Products: Do NOT put pads or covers in a washing machine. Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate. Do NOT put in clothes dryer. With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. Alternatively, wipe the surface with any normal household soap or cleaning solution that is not irritating and to which you are not allergic. Gel Wraps for Swing Away Wheelchair Footrest Features: Provide lower leg protection. Durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. Will not harden or soften in the cold or heat. Odorless, colorless, and latex free. Secured with Velcro to swing-away footrests of standard wheelchairs. Gel Wrap for Swing Away Wheelchair Footrest Specifications: Fits: standard swing away wheelchair leg rests. Sold as: one pair. Material: medical grade silicone gel. Cover: neoprene. Gel pad thickness: 0.5 inch. Dimensions: 12 inches long, 4 inches wide.

name: Long Loop Easi Grip Scissors
Description: The Long Loop Easi Grip Scissors have been designed to help overcome difficulties encountered by those with weak hand or grip conditions that make the use of conventional style scissors uncomfortable or impossible.Using the index finger to provide guidance and control, the middle, ring and little fingers are inserted through the loop to provide the strength for the cutting action. Alternatively for those with very limited movement the fingers can be placed over the long loop. Gently squeeze the scissors shut, the spring-action of the handle will automatically reopen the scissors as soon as the grip is eased.Recommended for Weak Grip or for Poor Hand Control Long Loop Easi Grip Scissors Features: Long loop handle allows the strength of middle, ring and little finger to be used while the index finger is placed outside the loop and used for guidance. Colour coded handles easily identify whether for right hand (blue), or for left hand (green). Blade guard supplied for safety when not in use. High quality handle that will not snap and retains spring action. Long Loop Easi Grip Scissors Specifications: 3 inch Pointed Stainless steel blades. Ultra lightweight.
ShortDescription: Designed to overcome difficulties encountered by those with weak hand or grip conditions.

Description: The high quality Easi-Grip Weeder garden tool has a specially angled ergonomic handle making it comfortable to use. By keeping your hand and wrist at a natural angle it helps eliminate the strains and blisters that can be caused by conventional style garden tools.The green ?soft-feel? grip has a non-slip waterproof finish making the garden tool easy to grip even if you have wet hands. The highly polished finish of the stainless steel stops soil sticking to the tool making the tool easier to use and clean. Easi Grip Weeder Features: Ideal for digging out dandelions and other pesky weeds. Ergonomically angled handle keeps hand and wrist in a natural position, preventing strain whilst gardening. "Soft feel" non-slip handle. Easi Grip Weeder Specifications: Overall length: 13 inches. Weight: 10.8 oz. Stainless steel, high quality metal. The Easi Grip Weeder tool can be used with the plug-in arm support cuff which allows the strength of the forearm to also be used.

name: Heelift Bariatric Suspension Boot
Description: The Heelift Bariatric Suspension Boot boasts all of the same qualities as Heelift Standard, but is designed specifically for bariatric patients (patients who weigh up to 600 pounds). Healthcare professionals are increasingly recognizing obesity as a risk factor for diabetes and associated complications, including heel pressure ulcers. Heelift® Bariatric Suspension Boot helps prevent heel pressure ulcers in patients who are particularly prone to suffer from the condition. Specifically, Heelift Bariatric was developed for patients weighing up to 600 pounds who have a calf circumference of between 12 to 23 inches. Like Heelift Standard, Heelift Bariatric offloads the heel by redistributing pressure from the heel to the patient's calf. The design of Heelift Bariatric minimizes contact between the patient's leg and objects that can cause pressure at the heel or at folds in the skin. Rounded, adjustable straps and a smooth, friction-free tricot backing also ensure that the Heelift will not rub against or cause impressions on the patient's other leg. Together with diligent care and monitoring, Heelift Bariatric can help even the most at-risk patients prevent heel pressure ulcers. Boot is non-returnable if packaging is opened. Heelift Bariatric Suspension Boot Features: Extended Stitching: Located along the top rim, the added stitching narrows the forefoot and increases support to provide improved protection against foot drop, equines deformity, or heel cord contracture. "Easy-on, easy-off" rounded straps and D-ring closures: Padded Velcro® straps are easy for the patient and/or healthcare professional to use and can easily be adjusted to accommodate specific patient needs. Friction-free tricot backing: Unlike other suspension products, which can have sharp edges on the back that can rub against the patient's other leg, Heelift is manufactured with a smooth tricot backing that aids in patient mobility and helps ensure patient safety. Smooth foam: Heelift Bariatric is available in Smooth foam only. Smooth foam is ideal for patients with edematous legs as it will not create "impressions" on the leg. Ventilation holes: Ventilation holes provide additional air circulation to promote increased patient comfort. Tricot covered stiffener: This feature prevents Heelift from buckling for added patient comfort and safety. The Heelift features forefoot support using a spring back technology to keep the foot upright. The Heelift can be autoclaved for sterilization. Close the straps and place in a normal autoclave wrapper. The Heelift can be machine-washed and dried. Simply tighten the straps and enclose in a net laundry bag or a pillow case. Heelift Bariatric Suspension Boot Specifications: Can be autoclaved for sterilization. For calf circumference of between 12 to 23 inches. For patients weighing up to 600 pounds.
ShortDescription: Redistributes pressure and prevents heel ulcers.

name: EZ Glyder Walker Glides
Description: Today?s lifestyle requires ease of movement over various surfaces, and the old-fashioned ?hop-hop-hop? method is not acceptable for people on the move. There is no better alternative to EZ Glyder Walker Glides . This tested and proven design meets all the needs of anyone that uses a walker. EZ Glyders glide over all types of surfaces with ease and they are made of a long-lasting plastic material that can withstand many years of use, unlike our competitors, who tend to wear out within weeks! EZ Glyder Walker Glides Features: Solves the "hop, hop, hop" problem for anyone having to use a walker. Easily over many types of surfaces, including concrete, vinyl, carpet and wood. EZ Glyder Walker Glides Specifications: Made of a long-lasting plastic material that can withstand many years of use. Fits walker legs with 1 inch diameter tubing.
ShortDescription: Made of a long-lasting plastic material that can withstand many years of use.

name: Fleece Lined Hooded Poncho
Description: The Fleece Lined Hooded Poncho was designed for wheelchair and scooter users. Clean, classic lines - perfect for both men and women. Fleece lined for cozy warmth. Cut shorter in back for comfort when sitting. Ample over-the-knee coverage. Water repellent shell made of 100% nylon Supplex. Completely lined with cozy 100% polyester fleece. 14" zippered front opening for easy on and off. Features: Fleece lined for cozy warmth. Cut shorter in back for comfort when sitting. Water repellent shell made of 100% nylon Supplex. Specifications: One size fits most. Approximate Measurements - Front length: 40"; Back length: 25-1/2"; Neck to wrist length: 22". Machine wash warm, delicate cycle, tumble dry low.
ShortDescription: Fleece Lined Hooded Poncho designed for wheelchair and scooter users.

name: Health Circle Sliding Transfer Bench
Description: Comfortably and safely enter the tub with the Health Circle Sliding Transfer Bench . Sit down then lift your legs into the tub and slide over. The sliding seat moves with you. Easy lock seat release self-locates and locks into position when you are safely in the tub area. Shower curtain can still fit inside tub to keep the floor dry. Individually height adjustable legs accommodate most all tub shapes and models. Hand held shower holster on both sides.Non returnable hygiene item. Health Circle Sliding Transfer Bench Features: Self draining seat. Suction feet help stability in the tub. Reversible design. Soap caddy and handle. Easy lift release lock. Health Circle Sliding Transfer Bench Specifications: 5 minute assembly. Seat height adjusts from 18.5 inches to 22.5 inches high. Seat size - 22 inches Wide x 16 inches Deep. Back size - 13 inches High x 18 inches Wide. Foot print - 36 inches Wide x 15.5 inches Deep. 300 lb weight rated.
ShortDescription: Helps you to comfortably and safely enter the bathtub.

name: Granny Jo Wheelchair, Walker or Scooter Bag
Description: The Granny Jo Products Wheelchair, Walker, or Scooter Bag attaches easily by using adjustable straps and clip fasteners. The bag is 100% cotton featuring an outside pocket with zippered compartment for a cell phone and interior slots for credit cards and ID. This 16" by 9" Wheelchair/Walker/Scooter Bag is 100% cotton duck with Velcro closure. The bag features adjustable length straps that are secured with clip fasteners. The interior of the bag has a keyring holder and slots for credit cards or ID. The outside has a pocket with a zippered compartment ideal for holding a cell phone.For wheelchair use the bag can be attached on the inside or outside of the chair's arm depending on the wheel configuration or hung on the back of the chair.Scooter users can adjust the straps to fit the width of the arm on their machine. Granny Jo Wheelchair, Walker or Scooter Bag Features: Outside pocket has a zippered compartment ideal for holding a cell phone. Interior compartment has a keyring holder and slots for credit cards or ID. 100% cotton-duck fabric. Attaches easily to wheelchairs walkers and scooters. Granny Jo Wheelchair, Walker or Scooter Bag Specifications: Attaches using adjustable straps and clip fasteners. Construction: 100% cotton duck with Velcro closure. Measures: 16 x 9 inches. One Walker/Wheelchair Bag.
ShortDescription: 16" by 9" bag featuring outside pocket with zippered compartment for cell phone and interior slots for credit cards & ID
MerchantGroup: Walker Bags, Totes, Packs and Pouches

name: Wireless Wander Door Alarm
Description: The Wireless Wander Door Alarm alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room or window, or wanders into an unsupervised area. This wireless alarm system has a door or window sensor which attaches easily to a door and doorjamb or to a window and window frame.This two-part alarm system has a door sensor mounted in the resident's room and a wireless receiver/alarm carried by the caregiver. The receiver will alert you with a beep or vibrate. The door sensor attaches easily to both sides of the doorjamb. When the door or window is opened, the electronic signal is sent to the remote receiver. The signal alerts the caregiver that the resident is either wandering out of safe range or entering a non-supervised area. Excellent for home use - offers caregivers the peace of mind and freedom to attend other duties.System includes a battery in the sending unit and mounting instructions. Wireless Wander Door Alarm Features: Signal alerts the caregiver that the resident is wandering. When a door is opened, an electronic signal is sent to the remote receiver. Excellent for home use. Door sensor attaches easily. Alert can be set to Beep or Vibrate. A low-battery indicator light alerts you when to change batteries. Wireless Wander Door Alarm Specifications: Range: up to 100 feet. Alerting chime rings at 80 to 85 decibels. Sending unit uses one 9V battery (not included). Receiver uses one 12V battery (included).
ShortDescription: Alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room.

name: Self Adjusting Straw Holder
Description: The Self-Adjusting Straw Holder will hold drinking straws from 1/4 to 3/4 inch diameter. The flexible joints in this straw holder make it automatically adjust to hold firmly and securely. It is made of extremely light weight stainless steel. Simply slide any size straw into the straw clip and attach the holder to the side of any water bottle, cup or glass. The straw will not move! **Long Drinking Straw and Cup Holder shown in image are sold separately. Self Adjusting Straw Holder Features: Automatically adjusts for different straw sizes. Prevents your straw from moving. Self Adjusting Straw Holder Specifications: Fits: Straw sizes 1/4 up to 3/4 inch diameter. Material: Light weight stainless steel.
ShortDescription: Automatically adjust to hold a straw firmly and securely to the side of any water bottle, cup or glass.

name: Wanchik's Pediatric Writer
Description: This specially designed Wanchik's Pediatric Writer device slides comfortably on, wrapping around your hand between the thumb and the index finger. Insert your standard pen or pencil into the holder. The tool supports your writing utensil for a more relaxed hand when writing.This writing utensil holder holds the pen for you! Children with decreased dexterity will be able to hold the writing finger in the proper position. Wanchik's Pediatric Writer Features: Wraps comfortably around the palm. Helps give individuals with weakened hand, finger and/or wrist dexterity the support and control needed to write. Wanchik's Pediatric Writer Specifications: Plastic-covered aluminum. Designed to fit pencils and thin ballpoints. Easily bendable for a customized fit.
ShortDescription: For children with decreased dexterity.

name: Sleeve Guards
Description: Sleeve Guards are made to slip comfortably over your forearms to protect your shirt sleeves, jackets, and skin against moisture and dirt. Sleeve Guards are typically used by manual wheelchair users, but they can be used by anyone looking to protect their arms. Dirt and moisture can ruin expensive clothes. So can wheel wear. Sleeve Guards slip over your forearms to protect your jacket and shirt sleeves. Once you get where you're going, slip them off of your clean sleeves. Sleeve Guard Features: Protects your shirt sleeves, jackets, and skin against moisture and dirt. Can be used by anyone looking to protect their arms when using wheelchairs. Sleeve Guard Specifications: Size: one size fits all.
ShortDescription: Helps protect shirt sleeves, jackets, and skin against moisture and dirt.

name: Power Chair Covers
Description: Power Chair Covers are specifically designed to protect a power wheelchair from the weather during carrier transportation and from dust during storage. Easily slip the cover over a power chair and tie it down using either the (4) metal grommets found on regular cover models, or by the (12) reinforced tie down loops found on heavy duty cover models. *Please note: Power chair Mobility Covers are not intended for highway use without using a securing device such as rope or cords over the top and through the grommet holes or tie down loops. This will reduce the amount of excess room under the cover and prevent billowing at high speeds. Power Chair Cover Features: Protects a power chair from the weather and dust. Great for transportation and storage. Standard Fabric Model MDV1300 includes a carrying pouch. Power Chair Cover Specifications: Warranty: Manufacturer's 1 year. Measures: 38H x 18W x 44L inches. 124 inch circumference. Regular Model: 4 metal grommet tie down points. Heavy Duty Model: 12 reinforced tie down loops. Made: USA.
ShortDescription: Helps protect a power wheelchair from the weather during carrier transportation.

name: Lightweight Adjustable Folding Designer Cane, Beige Floral
Description: The decorative aluminum Beige Floral Designer Folding Cane features an attractive floral pattern. The cane is 3/4 inch in diameter. Four sections extend automatically when removed from pocketbook or purse to provide a convenient support cane from 33 to 37 inches. A Polished contour wood derby top style handle provides a secure grip. Slip resistant rubber tip for safety. Lightweight Adjustable Designer Cane, Beige Floral Features: Attractive pattern. Compact folding design fits in a pocket book or carrying case. Includes slip resistant rubber tip for safety. Lightweight Adjustable Designer Cane, Beige Floral Specifications: Construction: strong, lightweight anodized 3/4 inch aluminum tubing. Height: adjusts from 33 to 37 inches in 1 inch increments. Weight capacity: 250 pounds.
ShortDescription: Decorative aluminum adjustable folding walking canes feature attractive multi-color patterns.

name: Cleanwave Sanitizing Furniture & Bed Vac
Description: The CleanWave Sanitizing Furniture & Bed Vac eliminates odors and up to 99.9% of viruses (including H1N1), bacteria (including MRSA), germs, mold, bed bug, dust mite and flea eggs on household surfaces without harsh chemicals that can damage fabrics, upholstery and the environment.CleanWave deodorizes and kills germs, bed bugs, dust mite and flea eggs on mattresses and bedding without damaging fabrics.Tested by United States independent third party laboratories. CleanWave is proven to be a fast and effective sanitizer. UV-C light is effective at killing bed bug eggs and bed bug nymphs. Testing has been performed by a United States independent third party laboratory using UV-C light against bed bug eggs and bed bug nymphs. Cleanwave Sanitizing Furniture & Bed Vac Features: 400 Watts of power creates superior and consistent suction. Cyclonic action keeps dust and debris away from the filter, maintaining a strong suction. Easy empty, bagless design and 2-stage micro-allergy filtration prevents recirculation of pollutants. Detachable hand vacuum for quick cleanups and hard to reach places. Cleanwave Sanitizing Furniture & Bed Vac Specifications: One year limited manufacturer warranty. Body Length: 13? Long. Body Width: 5.25?. Weight: 5.0 lbs.
ShortDescription: Deodorizes and kills germs, bed bugs, dust mite and flea eggs on mattresses and bedding without damaging fabrics.

name: Swivel Tray for Couch Cane
Description: The swivel tray is sold as an accessory to the couch cane (the two items together is the same as the Assist-a-Tray AST2050).So, if you already have the couch cane, now you can add the swivel tray. Swivel Tray for Couch Cane Features: Allows you to upgrade your couch cane to an Assist-A-Tray. Includes a cup holder and pencil holder. No tools required for assembly. Tray swivels and arm pivots 360 degrees. Swivel Tray for Couch Cane Specifications: Fits AST412 Couch Cane. Easy installation. Measures 16 x 18 inches. 30 pound weight limit.
ShortDescription: Allows you to upgrade your couch cane with a swivel tray.

name: Walker Caddy
Description: Use the Walker Caddy to carry a variety of personal items, even drinks and meals safely and independently on your walker. Convenient tray and basket enable user to even carry drinks and meals. Attaches and removes quickly and conveniently to folding walkers. Does not interfere with walker handles. Basket underneath tray enables patients to carry a variety of personal items. Made of tough durable plastic. Easy to clean. Walker Caddy Features: Convenient tray with under-tray storage. Does not interfere with walker handles. Easily attaches to any standard walker. Walker Caddy Specifications: Measures 15.47? x 12.41? x 5?.
ShortDescription: Carry a variety of personal items, even drinks and meals safely and independently on your walker.

name: E Size Oxygen Tank Holder for Walkers
Description: The TO2TE® Walker O2 Bag easily attaches an E size oxygen tank to a wheeled walker without tools. The holder allows you to maneuver an oxygen tank and a rolling walker at the same time. It helps users regain their confidence and independence to move about as needed.Lightweight, machine washable nylon includes a pocket for an oxygen wrench. Sturdy Velcro® attachment straps. E Size Oxygen Tank Holder for Walkers Features: Helps users regain their confidence and independence to move about as needed. Easily attaches an oxygen tank to a wheeled walker without tools. Includes a pocket for an oxygen wrench. E Size Oxygen Tank Holder for Walkers Specifications: Holds one "E" cylinder. Rugged, nylon construction. Sturdy Velcro® straps. Attaches to most 2 wheeled walkers. *Walker, cylinder and valve wrench are not included.
ShortDescription: Helps users regain their confidence and independence to move about as needed.

name: Cane Expressions Blue Cane Cover
Description: The Cane Expressions Blue Cane Cover dresses up old and unadorned canes with a stylish stretchy pull-on royal blue colored cane sleeve. This beautiful blue fabric sleeve transforms your mobility aid into a fashion accessory. Cane Expressions Blue Cane Cover Features: Royal blue colored cane sleeve helps to dress up an unadorned cane. Sleeve easily slips over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Blue Cane Cover Specifications: Length: Sleeve is 27 inches long. Material: Made of washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Royal Blue.
ShortDescription: Royal blue fabric can coordinate your standard walking cane with a variety of outfits.

name: Panoramic Mirror
Description: A Panoramic Mirror can reduce your blind spots and make driving much safer. Big vehicles always have bigger mirrors, but now you can get the additional safety too. Easy to clip on over your existing mirror, you can be using it in minutes. Panoramic Mirror Features: Widens your view to help reduce blind spots while driving. Over-sized mirror which assists with the drivers? peripheral vision. Creates a complete - seamless view. Assists with backseat monitoring. Panoramic Mirror Specifications: Clips on over-top of your existing mirror. Mirror size is 17 inches x 3 inches. Made of a treated anti-glare crystal glass. Non-glare convex mirror Shatterproof.
ShortDescription: Widens your view to help with reduce blind spots while driving.

name: Heelift Petite Smooth Suspension Boot
Description: The Heelift Petite Smooth Suspension Boot is indicated for pediatric patients or for patients who are smaller than what is considered the average size for an adult. Specifically, Heelift® Petite works best for patients ranging in height from 3'10 to 5'4 and whose calf circumferences measure 6 to 10 inches. Children, just like adults, are at risk for heel pressure ulcers if they are stationary for long periods of time due to health conditions or multihour surgery. Heelift Petite, together with turning and careful monitoring of the skin, can aid in preventing pressure ulcers in these young patients. Boot is non-returnable if packaging is opened. Heelift Petite Smooth Suspension Boot Features: Shorter length proximal to the heel: To accommodate short patients, the length of Heelift Petite is shorter than Heelift Standard. Extended Stitching: Located along the top rim, the added stitching narrows the forefoot and increases support to provide improved protection against foot drop, equines deformity, or heel cord contracture. "Easy-on, easy-off" rounded straps and D-ring closures: Padded Velcro® straps are easy for the patient and/or healthcare professional to use and can easily be adjusted to accommodate specific patient needs. Friction-free tricot backing: Unlike other suspension products, which can have sharp edges on the back that can rub against the patient's other leg, Heelift is manufactured with a smooth tricot backing that aids in patient mobility and helps ensure patient safety. Smooth or Convoluted foam: Heelift Petite is available in either Smooth or Convoluted foam. Smooth foam is ideal for patients with edematous legs as it will not create "impressions" on the leg. Convoluted foam is slightly cooler to wear. Ventilation holes: Ventilation holes provide additional air circulation to promote increased patient comfort. Tricot covered stiffener: This feature prevents Heelift from buckling for added patient comfort and safety. The Heelift features forefoot support using a spring back technology to keep the foot upright. The Heelift can be autoclaved for sterilization. Close the straps and place in a normal autoclave wrapper. The Heelift can be machine-washed and dried. Simply tighten the straps and enclose in a net laundry bag or a pillow case. Heelift Petite Smooth Suspension Boot Specifications: Can be autoclaved for sterilization. For calf circumferences measuring 6 to 10 inches. For patients ranging in height from 3'10 to 5'4. Petite Boot measures 10.5 inches from heel to calf, 6.75 inches from heel to toe.

Description: The Heelift Petite Convoluted Suspension Boot is indicated for pediatric patients or for patients who are smaller than what is considered the average size for an adult. Friction-free tricot backing: Unlike other suspension products, which can have sharp edges on the back that can rub against the patient's other leg, Heelift is manufactured with a smooth tricot backing that aids in patient mobility and helps ensure patient safety. Convoluted foam is slightly cooler to wear. Ventilation holes: Ventilation holes provide additional air circulation to promote increased patient comfort. Tricot covered stiffener: This feature prevents Heelift from buckling for added patient comfort and safety. The Heelift features forefoot support using a spring back technology to keep the foot upright. The Heelift can be autoclaved for sterilization. Close the straps and place in a normal autoclave wrapper. The Heelift can be machine-washed and dried. Simply tighten the straps and enclose in a net laundry bag or a pillow case. Heelift Petite Convoluted Suspension Boot Specifications: Can be autoclaved for sterilization. For calf circumferences measuring 6 to 10 inches. For patients ranging in height from 3'10 to 5'4. Petite Boot measures 10.5 inches from heel to calf, 6.75 inches from heel to toe.

name: EZ - Access 6 FT Suitcase Ramp Signature SS6
Description: The new EZ - Access 6 ft Suitcase Ramp Signature SS6 features an extruded non-skid tread for superior traction, and a self-adjusting bottom transition plate for easy conversion from ramp to ground. The Signature Series Suitcase Ramps are ultra-strong, single-fold ramps that provide the safety and strength required while remaining lightweight and portable. The hinge features a no-pinch, non-protruding live hinge for safe, silent, and maintenance free operation. The ergonomically designed flexible, non-breakable handles offer convenient carrying and a comfortable grip. The 800 lb weight capacity allows the ramp to safely support power scooters, power wheelchairs and manual wheelchairs. Welded construction provides long-term durability and safety. EZ - Access 6 FT Ramp Features: Non-skid surface. Built-in carrying handle. Lightweight and portable. Easy conversion from ramp to ground. EZ - Access 6 FT Ramp Specifications: Usable size: 6 feet x 30 inches. Folded size: 72 inches x 15 inches x 4 inches. Weight: 34 pounds. Weight capacity: 800 pounds. Warranty: Manufacturer's 3 year. Made of: Aluminum.
ShortDescription: Helps make the maneuverability of wheelchairs or scooters much easier.

name: Ingrid Classic Cane or Crutch Tip - Medium
Description: The Ingrid Classic Cane or Crutch Tip is manufactured in Sweden and made of high quality polyurethane. The use of this material makes them extremely durable and provides for an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. Safety is enhanced because the tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional tip. Inside the tip is a rust proof metal washer made of zinc plated steel which prevents the cane or crutch from wearing through the tip. The "tire track" treads at the point of contact provide an excellent grip on most surfaces. The convex bottom enhances both walking comfort and durability. This cane tip has a patented elastic neck which adjusts to the dimension of the cane or crutch shaft, making it easy for the user to replace tips as needed. Ingrid Classic Cane or Crutch Tip Features: Extremely durable and provides for an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. Tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional tip. Convex bottom enhances both walking comfort and durability. Ingrid Classic Cane or Crutch Tip Specifications: Fits: cane and crutch shafts measuring 5/8 inch - 7/8 inch (16 - 22 millimeters). Color - black.
ShortDescription: Excellent grip both indoors and outdoors.

name: The Quick Desk
Description: The Quick Desk is a comfortable work surface to write on when at home or on the road. Its sturdy, light weight design adjusts effortlessly to fit anyone.The Quick Desks™ locking legs ensure a snug, comfortable fit for anyone. Proper fit is achieved by simply pushing a release button and sliding The Quick Desks legs to your leg for the perfect fit. It's that easy.When you use The Quick Desk you will find that it's unique design along with its lightweight and versatility make it a must have for yourself and the perfect gift to give to others. The Quick Desk Features: Locking legs ensure a snug, comfortable fit for anyone. Small size allows it to be stored very easily. The Quick Desk Specifications: Lightweight and versatile. Size: 7 3/4 W x 9 1/2 L.
MerchantSubCategory: Tables for over the Bed, Couch or Chair
ShortDescription: Sturdy, light and comfortable work surface to write on.

name: DiabEase Foot Therapy Scrub
Description: Our DiabEase™ Exfoliating Foot Scrub provides gentle but thorough exfoliation that will help keep feet moisturized and silky smooth. Dead Sea minerals improve circulation and draws out toxins. Antiseptic Tea Tree helps protect skin from impurities. Botanical Green Tea, Ginseng, Vitamin C, Thyme, Sage, and Rosemary revitalize the skin.As part of a total, natural diabetic foot care regimen, this gently exfoliating botanical/mineral Foot Scrub helps purify and soften the feet while removing dry, dead skin layers. Helps improve the penetration of foot moisturizers. DiabEase Foot Therapy Scrub Features: Antibacterial Dead Sea Minerals stimulate circulation and draw out toxins. Botanical Green Tea, Ginseng, Thyme, Sage, and Rosemary revitalize the skin. Antiseptic Tea Tree helps protect skin from impurities. Vitamin C helps keep feet smooth and soft. DiabEase Foot Therapy Scrub Specifications: 6 oz. tube. Ingredients: Water, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Walnut Shell Powder, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Dead Sea Mineral Salt, Propylene Glycol, PEG-100 Stearate, Menthol, Aloe Barbadensis, Pumice, Camillia Sinensis (Green Tea) extract, Panax Ginseng, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (tea tree) Leaf Oil, Ascorbic Acid (vitamin c), Phytonadione (vitamin k), Salvia (sage) extract, Rosemarinus Officinalis (rosemary) extract, Citric acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol (vitamin E), Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, aromatic essences.
MerchantSubCategory: DiabEase Diabetic Foot & Skin Care Products
ShortDescription: Scrub provides gentle but thorough exfoliation that will help keep feet moisturized and silky smooth.

name: Independence 2 Handled Nosey Cup
Description: The Independence 2 Handled Nosey Cup is ideal for those with swallowing problems. Two handles allow for easier holding and manipulation.Nosey cups have a cut out for the nose to allow drinking without bending the neck or tilting the head.Made of durable, translucent polypropylene to allow monitoring of hot and cold liquid intake. One cup with one nosey attachment. 2 Handled Nosey Cup Features: Allows monitoring of hot and cold liquid intake. Ideal for those with swallowing problems and poor grasp. Allows drinking without bending the neck or tilting the head. 2 Handled Nosey Cup Specifications: Measures 4-1/2"H x 3"D (11.4 x 7.6 cm). Latex free. Holds 8 oz. Microwave safe and dishwasher safe to 228 degrees F.
ShortDescription: Allows drinking without bending the neck or tilting the head.

name: Joystick Cover
Description: The Joystick Cover slips over the joystick to protect it from moisture. Moisture can slip into the vulnerable, exposed areas of your power wheelchair joystick to cause electrical problems. A plastic top lets you see through the top. An adjustable buckle lets you tighten the cover closely to the armrest and joystick, or leave it loose enough to slide your hand into the cover so that it stays warm and dry, too. The Joystick cover is made from high-quality durable nylon with urethane coating, for years of durable moisture-resistant use. Measures 13 inches long, 5 1/2 inches wide, 4 inches deep. Joystick Cover Features: Slips over the joystick to protect from moisture. See through plastic top. Tightens or loosens with an adjustable buckle. Joystick Cover Specifications: Material: durable nylon with urethane coating. Measurements: 13 x 5 1/2 x 4 inches. Color: Black. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Slips over the joystick to protect it from moisture.

name: 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail with Padded Pouch
Description: The Stander 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail with Padded Pouch helps prevent the user from falling out of bed. The bed rail can also be conveniently used as a hand rail to help assist in getting in and out of bed. Included is a safety bumper pad with an 8 pocket organizer pouch with 4 convenient pockets per side. The collapsible Safety Bed Rail pivots down the side of the bed making it easy to make up the bed. The Safety Bed Rail is easily installed to either side of any size home or hospital bed with the dual safety strap. This provides stability and the assurance that the rail will not be bumped out of place. Safety Rail with Padded Pouch Features: Rail pivots down to side of bed to allow user to get out of bed or provide space for making bed. Prevents falling from bed and can be used for assistance to sit up in bed. Safety bumper pad with 4 convenient pockets per side. Can be placed on either side of the bed. Secures bed rail to any sized home or hospital bed frame. Safety Bed Rail with Padded Pouch Specifications: Width of Rail: 30 inches. Height of Rail: 23 inches high from the base of mattress. Gap Between Rails: 3 inches. Weight Capacity: 400 lbs. Assembly: Installs in minutes with 4 bolts and Allen Wrench (Included).
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Helps prevent the user from falling out of bed and can be used as a hand rail.

name: 2 Piece Scooter Seat and Tiller cover Set
Description: The Diestco 2 Piece Scooter Seat and Tiller Cover helps protect your power scooter and tiller from moisture by preventing any unwanted water damage to your power scooter. It works great with your power scooter seat and tiller on lifts or for storing outside. When using the tiller cover in operations, controls are still visible. The seat cover not only protects your seat from moisture, you can also sit in your seat while the cover is on. Locking drawstring keeps it tight around the base of your seat. These covers form fit to your power mobility vehicle. Simply slip it over your scooter and use the locking drawstrings along the bottom to secure. (Seat and Tiller Covers are also sold separately). Scooter Cover Features: Helps provide protection from the elements. Covers form fit to your mobility vehicle. Scooter Cover Specifications: Material: Water-resistant nylon fabric and plastic. Attachment: Locking drawstrings. Includes: Regular Tiller Cover MDV2100 and Seat Cover MDV2010.
ShortDescription: Helps provide protection from the elements.

name: 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail
Description: The Standers 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail is collapsible and pivots down the side of the bed to help the user get in and out of bed.The Safety Bed Rail also works as a side rail to help prevent user from falling out of bed. The Safety Bed Rail attaches easily to any size home or hospital bed and is reversible, allowing the rail to be placed on either side of the bed. Included is a dual safety strap that secures the bed rail to the bed frame. The easy yet sturdy design allows you install the rail within minutes with only 4 bolts and an Alan wrench. The Safety Bed Rail helps keep loved ones safe and gives caregivers peace of mind. 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail Features: Collapsible rail folds down to side of bed. Easy to install, includes all necessary parts. Fits on either side of bed. Prevents falls and assists with mobility. 30 Inch Safety Bed Rail Specifications: Assembly: installs in minutes and includes all necessary tools. Rail Width: 30". Rail Height: 23" high from the base of mattress. Gap Between Rails: 3". Weight Capacity: 400 lbs.
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Helps prevent falling out of bed and can be used for assistance to sit up in bed.

name: EZ Access Universal Crutch Carry On
Description: EZ Access Universal Crutch Carry - On features a large inside pocket, front zipper pocket, small side pocket and outer mesh pocket. The Crutch Carry - On is specifically made for underarm crutches or forearm crutches. Universal fit easily attaches to crutch handles using adjustable hook and loop straps. Removal is simple and easy too. The Crutch Carry - On keeps essential items handy without interfering with mobility. Ideal for storing and carrying keys, glasses, papers, water bottles and other personal items. EZ Access Universal Crutch Carry On Features: Keeps items close and accessible. Large inside pocket. Front zipper pocket. Small side pocket. Outside mesh pocket. Easily attaches to canes or crutches. EZ Access Universal Crutch Carry On Specifications: Material: durable nylon. Length: 10 inches. Width: 5 ½ inches. Depth: 1 ¾ inches. Color: black.
ShortDescription: Helps keep essential items handy without interfering with mobility.

name: Recliner Riser
Description: The Stander Recliner Riser is a safe and easy solution to helping you get up safely from your recliner. When you stand from the typical recliner, it tilts forward, dropping the arms and seat of an already low chair by 3 - 4 inches. Simply raising the chair by 5 or 6 inches, necessary for independent standing, makes it dangerously unstable. When Recliner Risers are installed, they raise a chair 1 ¾ inches and limit the forward tilt allowing an additional 3 - 4 inches of lift. The 4 - 6 total inches of extra support gives a weakened person a biomechanical advantage and enables them to stand on their own. Recliner Risers attach quickly and easily to the wooden base of your favorite recliner. Our patented design raises your effective seat height 4 - 6 inches while only raising your chair 1 ¾ inches. The Riser helps give your chair a lift. Standers Recliner Riser Features: Makes standing or sitting easy. Does not interfere with rocking or reclining of chair. name: Lend-A-Hand
Description: Lend-A-Hand is a large universal sleeve that helps hold fishing rods, pot scrubbers, spatulas, rakes, brooms, paint rollers, shovels ? any tool with a handle. Lend-A-Hand can be used on the forearm or attached to the lower leg. Select the 3 appropriate length straps to fit your forearm or lower leg and slide them through attached D rings. See videos for various applications and uses of the versatile Lend-A-Hand. Hand wash, gentle soap, warm water, no bleach, air dry. Lend-A-Hand Features: One size fits most. name: Retractable Ice and Snow Spike Tip for Canes and Crutches - Large
Description: The Ingrid Cane or Crutch Tip with Retractable Spike easily retracts for use during summer months or while indoors. The Retractable Spike also provides a firm grip on snow, ice and most other outdoor surfaces. Designed and manufactured in Sweden, the cane or crutch tip is made of high quality polyurethane and provides an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. The retractable spike is made of stainless steel and will not rust. Retracted spike will not damage floors. The tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional cane or crutch tip. Inside the tip is a rust proof zinc-plated washer that prevents the cane or crutch from wearing through the tip. The tip has a patented elastic neck that adjusts to the dimensions of the cane or crutch shaft making it easy for the user to replace or substitute tips as needed. Retractable Ice & Snow Spike Tip for Canes & Crutches Features: Provides a firm grip on snow, ice and most other outdoor surfaces. Retracted spike will not damage floors. Easy to install. name: No Rinse Peri Wash Gallon
Description: The NoRinse Peri - Wash helps soothe private parts and leave them clean and odor-free. Plus, it's much more economical than disposable wipes! Peri - Wash contains skin softeners and cleansers for a healthy clean. It has light, powdery fragrance to help you feel fresh. Peri - Wash is a gentle hygienic cleanser that you spray onto soiled areas or directly onto toilet paper before you wipe. Toilet tissue alone may not leave you feeling fresh and moist wipes are expensive! Use the NoRinse Peri - Wash gallon size to refill your 8 oz plastic pump bottle. All you need is a couple of pumps to dampen the tissue each time you wipe, so each bottle lasts a long time. This medication reminder and automated pill dispenser is easy to use and the most affordable device of its kind. Designed with safety and convenience in mind, the Med-E-Lert Automatic Pill Dispenser features a secured, tamper-proof, locking key system to avoid over-medication. Holds a plate, bowl or glass secure, as well as reduces spillages while enabling people to retain their independence by feeding themselves. Dycem mats are ideal for one handed activities. Color contrast is important for many partially sighted, elderly people because the contrast helps to make items easier to see against work surfaces. Placing a brightly colored Dycem mat under a bowl will help make it easier to see as well as making the bowl more stable. The Dycem yellow has been endorsed for visually impaired by the Royal National Institute of Blind People. Dycem Yellow 8 inch Round Pads Features: Stop plates, glasses or bowls from sliding on the table surface. Reduces spillages. Ideal for one handed activities. Dycem Yellow 8 inch Round Pads Specifications: Size: 8 inches. Shape: Round. Color: Yellow. Not effective when wet.

name: Every Lip Block Combination Pack
Description: Every Lip Block Combination Pack contains 5 lip blocks which prevent individuals from inserting a straw too far into their mouth or biting the straw. Use them to encourage lip closure, lip rounding, and tongue retraction. Helps to correct overall tongue position too. Insert the long tapered end of the mouthpiece inside the upper end of a regular standard size straw. The Every Lip Block Combination Kit contains three rigid lip blocks in three different lengths, one firm flexible lip block and one soft flexible lip block. Flexible firm and flexible soft material can be cut to desired length. Every Lip Block Combination Pack Features: Fits into any regular straw. Prevents individuals from inserting straw too far into mouth. Every Lip Block Combination Pack Specifications: Includes: three rigid lip blocks in three different lengths: ¼ inch, ½ inch, and standard ¾ inch; one firm flexible ¾ inch, and one soft flexible ¾ inch. name: Printed Blue Double-Sided Quilted Walker Bag
Description: The Printed Blue Double Sided Quilted Walker Bag has handy, roomy pockets on each side of the bag so you can carry your personal belongings everywhere you go. Conveniently hangs over the walker crossbar and is held in place by hook-and-loop closures. This decorative bag allows you to carry your wallet or cell phone in the inside pocket for safety and carry your newspapers or magazines in the outside pocket. Machine wash and tumble dry. Printed Blue Double Sided Quilted Walker Bag Features: Conveniently hangs over walker crossbar. Machine wash and tumble dry. Printed Blue Double Sided Quilted Walker Bag Specifications: Pocket dimensions: 13 inches x 9 inches. Length: 15.5 inches. Width: 6.5 inches. Depth: 1.5 inches. Color: Printed Blue.
ShortDescription: Helps you carry your wallet, newspaper and other items with ease while using your walker.
MerchantGroup: Walker Bags, Totes, Packs and Pouches

name: Benefit 3D Clean Toothbrush Junior
Description: It is very tough to get kids to brush their teeth and brush correctly. The Benefit 3D Clean Toothbrush Junior makes better brushing simple and easy. The brush's unique flexible three independent head design allows kids to clean all tooth surfaces in a single brushing stroke while effectively removing plaque and gently massaging gum tissue. The Benefit Toothbrush brushes your teeth right every time almost automatically. The bristles completely surround the teeth, and automatically adjust to tooth contours, lengths and widths. It makes brushing easier, faster and better. It is accepted by the American Dental Association. Benefit 3D Clean Toothbrush Junior Features: 3 flexible heads. Tongue cleaner. Non slip grip handle. Benefit 3D Clean Toothbrush Junior Specifications: Overall length: 6½ inches. Handle length: 4½ inches. Width: ¾ inch. Colors: Assorted (sorry, no color choice).
ShortDescription: Helps kids brush their teeth correctly.

name: Blue Scooper Plate
Description: The Blue Scooper Plate can help people maintain independence and enjoy dining. For people with muscle control issues, hand ailments, severe arthritis or similar conditions, successful self feeding can be a real challenge. All scooper plates have a slightly taller rim on one side that has a reverse curve. The curve helps in scooping food onto a utensil. As food is pushed into this curve, it naturally rolls back onto a spoon or fork. Higher edges around the rest of the plate help corral foods and reduce the opportunity for spills. Scoop dishes are suitable for both adults and children. However, they are typically smaller than regular dinner plates, which is ideal for better portion size control. The Blue Scooper Dish is made of a darker blue plastic and the dark blue background provides high contrast for light color foods which may not be easily identified on white plates by persons with declining vision (a frequent occurrence with Alzheimer's patients). The Blue Scooper Plate diameter is 6 ¾ inches and has a circular shape. The edges are curved and half inch high with a one inch high reverse curve for scooping food. The bottom has a one-quarter inch rim. The scoop plate is molded of heat-resistant blue plastic and is dishwasher safe. The Blue Scooper Plate is also available with a suction cup base. See Scooper Plate with Suction Base CMI108. Blue Scooper Plate Features: Reverse curve for scooping food. Blue color provides high contrast for low vision. Also available with suction base. Dishwasher safe. Blue Scooper Plate Specifications: Diameter: 6¾ inches. Reverse curve height: 1 inch. Material: heat resistant plastic. Color: blue.
MerchantSubCategory: Adaptive Plates, Plate Guards and Bowls
ShortDescription: Helps scoop food onto your eating utensil.

name: ErgoTek  Plus 32 inch Reacher
Description: The ErgoTek Plus 32 inch Reacher ergonomic designed handle and trigger allows the heel of your hand and fingers to be in a more natural position. Picking up larger items such as cans is easier with this longer reacher with jaws that open to 3 1/4 inches. Use the magnetic tip in the end of the reacher for picking up small metal objects like paper clips. The upright pulling post on the tip end of the reacher is useful for dragging objects. A spring clip is included for storing the reacher on round tubing of your walker, wheelchair or bedside rail. This lightweight ergonomic grabber is ideal for light duty activities of daily living including dressing or picking up items from the floor. ErgoTek Plus 32 inch Reacher Features: Only 8 oz of pressure is required at the trigger to close the jaws. Lightweight and durable aluminum 32 inch long reacher. Helps grasp items from hard to reach places. Ideal for dressing and activities of daily living. Includes magnetic tip, clip for storing, and pulling post. ErgoTek Plus 32 inch Reacher Specifications: Jaws open: 3 1/4 inches. Length: 32 inches. Weight: 7.2 oz.
ShortDescription: Ergonomic designed handle and trigger require less pressure for grasping.

name: Ivory Verilux Magnifier
Description: The amazing lamp-mounted Verilux Magnifier is perfect for reading a book and doing fine detail work. With two magnifiers in one, this hands-free magnifier turns fine text into large print with two separate magnification ranges ? most of the lens is 2X magnification, plus a 6X spot lens is implanted in the first lens for seeing tiny details. The large 5 inch size is perfect for reading and needlework, and eyeglass-quality acrylic means there?s no distortion. The 18 inch flexible gooseneck stays put and makes perfect positioning easy. The built-in handle lets you adjust the scratch-resistant magnifier to any angle without putting fingerprints on the lens. But just in case you do get fingerprints or dust on the lens, a microfiber lens cloth is included. Verilux Magnifier for use with: Original Deluxe Natural Spectrum floor lamp. EasyFlex Deluxe Natural Spectrum floor lamp. Ivory Verilux Magnifier Features: Flexible All-Steel Gooseneck offers precise positioning and decades of durability. Ivory finish matches the EasyFlex Deluxe and Original Full spectrum ivory floor lamps. Optical Quality Acrylic, resists scratching and breaking; distortion-free. Ivory Verilux Magnifier Specifications: Magnification zones: 2X lens and 6X spot lens. Includes: microfiber polishing cloth.
ShortDescription: Hands free magnifier.

name: Large Muff Vest
Description: The Large Muff Vest was designed to allow the wearer to reach through the pocket to place their impaired arm in the support. Developed by the spouse of a stroke survivor, the Muff Vest provides support for a flaccid arm. The weight of the stroke arm is distributed and effectively supported over both shoulders. The Muff Vest provides arm control and support, even when the user is bending forward. The large front horizontal pocket is conveniently opened on both ends for left or right arm support. Two handy patch pockets offer convenient storage and accessibility for small frequently used items. Constructed of a cotton/polyester blend, machine washable fabric, with durable reinforced stitching. Hook and loop tab closure back opening. Ideal for hemiplegic upper extremities. Large Muff Vest Features: Provides support for a flaccid arm. Constructed of 65 percent polyester/35 percent cotton blend, machine washable fabric. Hook and loop tab closure back opening. Large Muff Vest Specifications: Universal fit: for either left or right arm support. Unisex design: can be worn by either sex. Colors: khaki. Size: large, fits 150 - 200 pounds.
ShortDescription: Provides support for a flaccid arm.

Youth Weighted Fork Features: Assists in stabilizing hand tremors to promote self feeding. Built up handles aid in grasping. Youth Weighted Fork Specifications: Handle diameter: 7/8 inch. Handle length: 3 1/4 inches. Weight: 4 ounces. Material: stainless steel with textured vinyl coated handle.
ShortDescription: Helps promote self feeding for children with tremors.

These high quality, felt or plush covered hollow rubber balls are simple to install and ready for you to use. Walkerballs help increase mobility by allowing walkers with front wheels to glide effortlessly on most surfaces. These hollow rubber balls offer a unique alternative to the rubber tips and glides for walkers. With Walkerballs, you can add personality to your walker and enjoy effortless, scuff-free movement across the floor. Designed to fit most walkers. Penco Red Walkerball Features: Easy to use. Pre-cut to prevent injuries from cutting tennis balls. Fits most walker legs regardless of tube diameter. Penco Red Walkerball Specifications: Color: red.

name: Adult Weighted Universal Standard Holder
Description: The Adult Weighted Universal Standard Holder will securely hold most round or irregular shaped items with three adjustable set screws. This large weighted holder can be used with pens, pencils markers, paintbrushes, crayons and any item that measures 1/8 in to 7/16 inch diameter. Provides added weight for those having difficulty in bearing down with a writing device or have shaky hands. The holder includes an allen wrench and three extra long screws enabling you to hold small diameter objects in the holder.Large weighted holder weighs approximately 6 1/2 ounces. Adult Weighted Universal Standard Holder Features: Can be used with any item that measures 1/8 inch to 7/16 inch diameter. Comes with an allen wrench and 3 extra long screws for smaller objects.
