ShortDescription: Adds weight to writing aids to help reduce tremor when writing.

name: See 4 Safety Mobility Light
Description: The See 4 Safety Mobility Light clips onto walkers, canes and rollators and provides users with additional light for safety. This automatic light source turns itself on when in motion and when it senses a low level light environment. It turns itself off after 30 seconds if there is no motion or when it senses a well-lit environment. Patented, hands-free, automatic illumination personal visual aid. Simply flip the on/off switch to the on position, clip the light to round tubing of a cane, walker or rollator and start moving. Three bright LEDs lights are powered by two AAA batteries (included). The light uses two sensors. First, a motion sensor determines movement. After 30 seconds of not being moved, the light turns off. Second, the light uses a lighting sensor to determine if it is in a low level light environment. Only when it is in a low light environment and in use will the light illuminate. Saves batteries and time. Choose the off setting position to turn the light off. See 4 Safety Mobility Light Features: Patented motion- and light-activated technology. Three super-bright, long-life LEDs for enhanced visibility. Easy to use clamp with foam padding for a secure grip. Great for nighttime bathroom trips. Automatically turns on and off. Attaches to any size walker, rollator, or cane tubing. Senses both low light level and motion. See 4 Safety Mobility Light Specifications: Includes: 2 standard AAA batteries. Length: 7 3/4 inches. Width: 4 5/8 inches. Height: 1 1/2 inches. Warranty: guaranteed to be free of manufacturing defects for a period of one year from date of purchase. At our option, NEPA Partners LLC will repair or replace any unit found to be defective in materials or workmanship under normal use. THIS WARRANTY DOES NOT COVER BATTERIES.
ShortDescription: Automatic light source for walkers, canes and rollators.

name: Enablers Dexterity Kit
Description: The Carex Enablers Dexterity Kit combines five items specifically designed to improve functional performance of common tasks and make daily life easier. The curved design of the EZ-Key turner begins the turning effort, so completion of the turn is accomplished with minimum additional stress. The Button Hook / Zipper Pull puller eliminates the stress and frustration of buttoning a button by pulling the button into position. The Pen and Pencil Cushion is designed in both shape and density to alleviate stress while providing a secure grip. The Spoon and Fork holders fit onto spoons and forks providing a larger gripping surface. The Lamp Switch Enlarger fits over the existing twist style switch to provide a larger gripping area for an easy, stress free grasp. The Enablers Dexterity Kit includes the necessary tools to make daily life easier and improve functional performance of common tasks. Packaged together, these items meet some of the most common daily household challenges faced by people with arthritis, hand tremors or other conditions. Designed for arthritis sufferers to help decrease joint pain and enhance hand function. Made of lightweight plastic, these items can help make simple tasks around the house a little easier. Return policy: Due to hygiene purposes, this item is non-returnable. Enablers Dexterity Kit Features: Enhances hand function. Reviewed by Certified Hand Therapist. Helps control arthritic deformities (Wrist Radial Drift, MCP Joint Ulnar Drift, Boutonierre Deformity, Swan Neck Deformity, and IP Joint Angulation Deformity). Enablers Dexterity Kit Specifications: Includes: 3 EZ Key Turners (AEN15), 3 Pen and Pencil Cushions (AEN21), 2 Lamp Switch Turners (AEN23), 2 Spoon and Fork Holders (AAM137), and 1 Button Hook/Zipper Pull. Material: lightweight plastic.
ShortDescription: Designed to help those with arthritis or hand tremors perform everyday tasks.

name: Easy to Use Walker Coasters
Description: Easy to Use Walker Coasters are a welcoming upgrade from traditional walker glides, walker wheels, and walker balls. These brightly colored, lightweight footpads are highly visible, making them easy for you to see where the legs of the walker are to avoid tripping or stumbling. Made of a special polymer blend, durable plastic that easily glides in all directions over concrete, carpets, and linoleum floors with very little effort. The unique design of these replacement walker footpads includes an O-ring to securely attach the Walker Coasters without tools. Unlike walker balls and tennis balls, Walker Coasters don?t absorb water or collect debris. Easy to Use Walker Coaster Features: Glides over doorways, sidewalks, and carpets. No tools required for assembly. Securely attaches to walker with O-ring design. Bright, easy to see color. Great alternative to tennis balls. Easy to Use Walker Specifications: Fits: all standard 1 inch walker legs. Width: 2 ½ inch diameter. Height: 1 ½ inches. Made: USA. Material: smooth, durable plastic. Color: bright yellow. Includes: package of 2.
ShortDescription: Helps glide your walker easily over bumps and cracks.

name: A Fitness Experience
Description: A Fitness Experience exercise DVD is ideal for strengthening to help prevent falls and improve balance. This strength training program was created by a certified exercise physiologist who specializes in senior adult fitness, health and wellness programs. He identified the lack of strength programs geared to those individuals who may have some physical limitation or have trouble getting started with conventional exercise programs. A Fitness Experience provides a great place to start. Using the exercises regularly could help prevent falls and significantly improve your balance. The introduction and closing includes valuable fitness and wellness information. Fitness Experience exercise video running time is 48 minutes. It is divided into 8 sections: warm up, legs and hips, back and shoulders, arms, abdominals, grip, balance and relaxation. You can use all of the program or only those sections for your specific needs. Testimonials: ?It?s a wonderful video? Ted Podleski, Director of Arizona Osteopathic Medical Association. ?I think the fitness video was a great idea and something very much needed.? Cindy Manning, State President, AAAP. A Fitness Experience Exercise DVD Features: Strength building program for the mature adult. Easy to follow directions. Real people, average 85 years old, performing real exercises. Toning workout video for beginners or lower level fitness clients. Most, but not all exercises are done from a seated position. A Fitness Experience Exercise DVD Specifications: Format: DVD. Length: 48 minutes.
ShortDescription: Provides a strength building program to help prevent falls and improve balance.

name: Fire Gone Fire Extinguisher
Description: Fire Gone is a fire extinguisher disguised as a compact easy to use aerosol can. Cooking mishaps are the leading cause of fires in the home, according to the National Fire Protection Association. Traditional fire extinguishers are large, heavy, difficult to use, and often challenging for people with arthritis hands. Fire Gone delivers a strong targeted stream of specially formulated fire fighting foam that goes right to the source of the fire. This single use fire suppressant is effective on most electric, grease, fabric and wood fires. Just pull the safety tab, aim and squeeze the trigger. Fire Gone Fire Extinguisher foam is biodegradable so it is easy to clean up and won?t damage surfaces. Fire Gone Fire Extinguisher Features: Stops fires fast. Simple to use can and spray nozzle design. Biodegradable foam fire suppressant is simple to clean up. More effective than traditional fire extinguishers on most common fires. Contains no CFCs. AFFF Foam UL Certified. Fire Gone Fire Extinguisher Specifications: Diameter: 2 ½ inches. Height: 10 inches. Manufactured: USA.
ShortDescription: Stops flames fast.

name: Vibrating Alarm Medication Reminder
Description: The Vibrating Alarm Medication Reminder is an easy to use pill box that helps you organize your daily pills and reminds you with an audio and/or vibrating alarm 4 times per day. This remarkable little device is a handy and helpful addition to any medication regimen. Ideal for personal use and use in clinical applications, this compact little pill organizer is an assistive living aid that exceeds expectations. With simple, straightforward programming and easy alarm selection, this vibrating pill timer reminder is a convenient compliance device. This compact daily alarm pillbox has 4 large tablet compartments, an integrated clock with dedicated alarm, 4 different audio and vibration alarms. The digital LCD clock face displays the time, alarm type and the alarm number with a crisp blue backlight. Strong but discreet vibrating alarm only you will know it is going off, or loud beeping alarm or both, vibrating AND beeping alarm. Snooze alarm repeats after 4 and 8 minutes. Manufacturer one year warranty. Vibrating Alarm Medication Reminder Features: Displays time with backlight. Four programmable daily alarms. Set both audible and vibration alarms at the times of your choice. Four pill containers hold 8 aspirin sized tablets per compartment. Slim design slips easily into pockets or purses. Alarm remembers your settings each day. Vibrating Alarm Medication Reminder Specifications: Measures: 2 3/4 inches x 2 1/2 inches x 7/8 inch. Power: 1 AAA battery (not included), 3 button cells LR44 (included). Weight: 3 ounces (with batteries).
ShortDescription: Alerts individuals when it is time to take their medication.

name: Soft Flexible LIp Blocks
Description: Soft Flexible Lip Blocks allow you to cut the length to the perfect size. Lip Blocks help discourage an individual from biting the straw or thrusting the tongue. It also corrects tongue position and prevents the straw from going too deep inside the mouth. Lip blocks can be helpful with tensing for controlled lip and tongue movement. Lip blocks should only be used by a professional therapist or by a caregiver trained in their use and should be supervised at all times. Soft Flexible Lip Block Features: Use with regular straws. Prevents the straw from being inserted too deeply into your mouth. Can be cut for custom length. Dishwasher Safe. Soft Flexible Lip Block Specifications: Made: in USA. Mouthpiece size: ¾ inch. Length: 2 ½ inches. Diameter: ½ inch. Construction: medical grade material, latex free. Includes: package of 3. Color: lilac, color may vary.
ShortDescription: Helps correct tongue position.

name: Little Boost Platform
Description: Do you struggle getting out of your favorite chair? Need a boost? The affordable Little Boost Platform is ideal for those who suffer from weak knees, bad backs, stroke or arthritis. This platform is the safest and sturdiest chair riser on the market today. It is simple - requires no assembly and there are no moving parts. The security lip around the top and the rubber pads installed in each corner are safety features that help prevent your chair from moving or sliding. The platform will fit almost all recliners and chairs up to a chair base of 27 inches x 27 inches. Measure your chair base to ensure a proper fit. After your Little Boost Platform arrives at your home, set your chair on the platform and experience the difference. With your chair elevated 3 inches you will be able to stand up and sit down with a lot less effort and you will feel totally secure at the same time. Made in USA. Little Boost Platform Features: Fits recliners and regular chairs up to 27 inches x 27 inches. No tools or assembly are required. Security lip all around the top. Square rubber pads on each corner hold your chair securely in place. Elevates chair 3 inches. Little Boost Platform Specifications: Construction: durable, recyclable ABS black plastic. Weight: 17 pounds. Weight capacity: 400 pounds. Overall Dimensions: 29 inches x 29 inches x 3.5 inches.
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Raises your recliner 3 inches.

name: Natural Spectrum PageLight
Description: The Natural Spectrum PageLight evenly illuminates each page while marking your place. Bright, natural light is spread gently across the page from a flat panel screen lit by LED Natural Spectrum lights. Measuring 7 inches x 6 inches, it's just the right size for a paperback, but sheds enough light for a hardcover book or magazine without glare. Read easily in bed or on dimly lit planes or trains without disrupting others around you. The PageLight features a dimming switch to adjust the intensity of light and serves as a page marker for your book. The PageLight will soon become a must have in your car for those long rides. Natural Spectrum PageLight Features: Light is spread evenly across the flat panel screen and illuminates each page without glare. Light stays on the page and provides excellent black and white contrast. Built-in dimmer switch allows you to adjust the light level as preferred. 3-AAA batteries (sold separately) provide up to 50 hours of reading pleasure. Natural Spectrum PageLight Specifications: Warranty: 1 year limited. Size: 7 inches x 6 inches. Weight: 0.4 pounds.
ShortDescription: Helps you read easier at night without disturbing others.

name: Natural Spectrum Book and Travel Light
Description: The Natural Spectrum Book and Travel Light is a 2.2 oz book light that slips into your purse, pocket or briefcase for flicker-free, glare-free indoor daylight anywhere. Clips to books or laptops for hands-free operation.The advanced cold-cathode bulb (included) never needs replacing. Fully adjustable with a unique double-articulating head, the book light head also swivels to place full spectrum illumination precisely on any surface. The Book and Travel Light also includes a built-in charger if you decide to use rechargeable batteries. When you plug it into your computer, the batteries will be recharged at the same time for an additional 4-6 hours of run time.Small print appears clearer and the high/low intensity switch allows you to tune the light for the specific application. It clips to books and menus or stands on its own. Natural Spectrum Book and Travel Light Features: Full spectrum daylight book light and computer light. Palm-sized travel light features exclusive Verilux technology that scientifically tunes light to the human eye to help improve vision, and reduce eyestrain. Book Light head turns 180º to shine light exactly where you need it. Clips or stands and folds down to form its own protective, travel-ready case. Operates battery-free via USB connection to computer. Uses either 2 regular or rechargeable AA batteries (not included). Natural Spectrum Book and Travel Light Specifications: Colors: silver or white. Height Range: 9 inches - 3.5 inches. Size: 3 inches x 3.4 inches. Warranty: 1 year limited.

name: BipGrip Pen Grip
Description: The BipGrip Pen Grip makes any standard pen, pencil or crayon easy to hold by reducing the required gripping power. It works for left and right handed users and is good for all ages. This ergonomic writing aid simplifies writing and drawing for even the weakest grip. BipGrip is latex free. The BipGrip can be used with crayons giving them added girth and weight and you can adjust the length of crayon to your own ideal setting. It's so easy to use: just unscrew, put in a pen, pencil or crayon and screw together. BipGrip Pen Grip Features: Makes any standard pen, pencil or crayon easy to use. Simplifies writing and drawing for weak grip or arthritis. Latex free. Made in the USA. BipGrip Pen Grip Specifications: Length: 4 1/2 inches. Diameter: 1 inch. Color: Red. Material: plastic.
ShortDescription: Easy to use and makes writing fun.
