Description: The large 5 inch Verilux Magnifier is perfect for reading and needlework, and eyeglass-quality acrylic means there?s no distortion. With two magnifiers in one, this hands free magnifier turns fine text into large print with two separate magnification ranges - most of the lens is 2X magnification, plus a 6X spot lens is implanted in the first lens for seeing tiny details. Attach the Magnifier to the Verilux Easy Flex or Verilux Original Floor lamp to task or read with ease. The 18 inch flexible gooseneck stays put and makes perfect positioning easy. The built-in handle lets you adjust the scratch-resistant magnifier to any angle without putting fingerprints on the lens. But, just in case you do get fingerprints or dust on the lens, a microfiber lens cloth is included. Verilux Magnifier for use with: Original Deluxe Natural Spectrum floor lamp. EasyFlex Deluxe Natural Spectrum floor lamp. Graphite Verilux Magnifier Features: Flexible All-Steel Gooseneck offers precise positioning and decades of durability. Graphite finish matches the EasyFlex Deluxe and Original Full spectrum graphite floor lamps. Optical Quality Acrylic, resists scratching and breaking; distortion-free. Satisfaction guaranteed by Verilux. Graphite Verilux Magnifier Specifications: Magnification zones: 2X lens and 6X spot lens. Includes: microfiber polishing cloth.
ShortDescription: Attaches to Verilux floor lamps.

name: Rise and Shine Wake Up Light
Description: The Verilux Rise and Shine Natural Wake-Up Light aligns the body's circadian rhythms that regulate normal sleeping and waking patterns. The light progressively dims or brightens while simultaneously decreasing or increasing the sound to create a natural, restful sleeping and waking experience. Unlike the sudden jolt of an alarm clock, the natural sunrise of the Rise and Shine won't disrupt the stages of sleep. Awaken peacefully, rested, revitalized and ready to start your day. The Sleep Mode feature simulates the setting of the sun by gradually dimming the light and allowing you to fall asleep gradually and peacefully. The Rise and Shine is a radio, natural alarm clock, dawn and dusk simulator and lamp that wakes you gently just as nature intended. Choose from four soundscapes or your favorite FM radio station to accompany your wake-up program. Rise and Shine Wake Up Light Features: 15 minute wake up program. Light progressively brightens prior to waking. Sleep mode gradually dims the light over a 5, 15, 30, or 60 minute period of time. High quality FM radio sound system. Dual alarms and 20 levels of brightness snooze feature. Rise and Shine Wake Up Light Specifications: Soundscapes: songbird serenade, ocean rhythms, pond life harmony, streamside melodies. Dimensions: 12 inches x 9 inches x 6 inches. Weight: 2.4 pounds.
ShortDescription: Helps you to wake peacefully, refreshed and re-energized.

name: Back Spa Back Scrubber
Description: Back Spa Back Scrubber is a unique back scrubber made of the same soft bristles as our famous Soapy Soles. It is designed for massaging and cleaning your back without all the twisting and turning. This long handled scrubber can even be used on the soles of your feet while lying in the tub. The opposite side of Back Spa Back Scrubber has well-placed ?bumps? for a more stimulating rub down. The Back Spa Back Scrubber would be great for anyone, but it is ideal for those with balance and mobility issues. Almost 1000 flexible fingers span the length of this body scrubber to work up an amazing lather and allow you to wash your body quickly and easily. This is what makes the Back Spa so great. It does an amazing job washing your back, but it is not limited to that use. Easily modify the way you hold it to wash legs, feet, buns, necks, arms and more without bending your body or straining in any way. Back Spa Back Scrubber Features: Long and flexible, easy to hold handles. Soft, gentle bristles side cleans and exfoliates, renewing the skin?s surface. Soft, nubby mounds on other side massages and stimulates circulation to tired, sore muscles. No more twisting and turning to clean your back. Stimulating back massage. Back Spa Back Scrubber Specifications: Color: pearl blue. Size: 41 inches long by 2 3/4 inches wide. Material: 100 percent PVC.
ShortDescription: Helps you scrub your back and other hard to reach places.

name: Verilux Easy Read Illuminated Magnifier
Description: The Verilux Natural Spectrum EasyRead Lighted Magnifier is an easy to use and lightweight portable illuminated magnifier that will brighten and magnify anything you want to read. With a pair of Natural Spectrum LED bulbs to help illuminate the reading material clearly, no other illuminated magnifier on the market today lights up the page like the Verilux Natural Spectrum EasyRead Lighted Magnifier! The Verilux EasyRead Lighted Magnifier is great for taking in the car or keeping in your purse or pocket. The 4.25 inch diameter lens is made of precision quality optical glass that provides crystal clear 2.5X magnification with a handy 5X spot magnifier. This lighted magnifier uses 2 AAA batteries which will last months under normal usage. The magnifier also comes with a switch to change from high to low to suit whatever the lighting condition is that you're in. Don't be stuck trying to read in the dark again! Verilux Easy Read Illuminated Magnifier Features: 2 LED Bulbs evenly light every page with Natural Spectrum high contrast illumination for better vision, even in dim light. 5X spot magnification lens. Lightweight and portable. Verilux EasyRead Illuminated Magnifier Specifications: Dimensions: 9.5 inches x 4.25 inches x 1 inch. Weight: 13 ounces. Includes: padded case and lens cloth.
ShortDescription: Offers two levels of magnification.

name: HappyLight 6000 Sunshine Supplement Light System
Description: Relieve the symptoms of the Winter Blues and seasonal change with the HappyLight 6000 . HappyLight is a sunshine supplement light system that provides Natural Spectrum® light when sunshine is unavailable. 6,000 LUX of white light emulates daylight to help prompt your body?s positive physiological responses to natural light to improve mood and overall sense of well-being. Experience improved energy, mood and concentration naturally with HappyLight. A patented Verilux bulb activates natural mood enhancers, Circadian Rhythms, without exposing you to harmful UV rays or EMFs. Compact unit delivers therapy-strength Natural Spectrum light using exclusive Verilux Flicker-Elimination Technology. At just 2 pounds and 12 inches tall, this ultra-portable unit makes it easy to get the nourishing light you need to brighten your mood, well-being, and thinking. HappyLight 6000 Sunshine Supplement Light System Features: Up to 6,000 LUX of Natural Spectrum daylight lifts spirits, sharpens concentration and improves energy levels. Helps recalibrate and normalize Circadian Rhythms for a healthy night's sleep. Emulates natural sunshine to improve mood and well-being. Energy efficient bulb uses only 36 Watts to produce 300 Watts of Natural spectrum light. UL listed in United States and Canada. HappyLight 6000 Sunshine Supplement Light System Specifications: Dimensions: 12 inches high x 3.9 inches wide x 5.6 inches deep. Weight: 2 pounds. Recommended daily use: 2 1/2 hours 18 inches from light; 1-6 hours per day. Color: white base, white cover, black power cord 8 ft long.
ShortDescription: Helps simulate natural sunshine to improve your overall mood.

name: CleanWave UVC Portable Toothbrush Sanitizer
Description: The CleanWave UV-C Portable Toothbrush Sanitizer is the safe and easy way to sanitize your toothbrush. Germs and bacteria thrive in the moist environment of a toothbrush, and live long after you are finished brushing and rinsing your toothbrush. The powerful UV-C light safely eliminates viruses, bacteria and germs from your toothbrush. The automatic 6-minute sanitizing cycle begins the moment you place your toothbrush in the sanitizer after brushing. When it?s time to brush your teeth again, your toothbrush will have been sanitized. The sturdy case is perfect for traveling and keeps your toothbrush sanitized and germ-free.The Verilux CleanWave UV-C Portable Toothbrush Sanitizer uses the same advanced UV-C light technology used to sterilize hospital equipment for over 30 years. CleanWave UVC Portable Toothbrush Sanitizer Features: 6-minute built-in-timer provides automatic sanitizing cycle. Uses 2-AAA batteries (not included). Automatic UV-C light shut-off when opened during operation. CleanWave UVC Portable Toothbrush Sanitizer Specifications: Dimensions: 8.58 inches high x 2.17 inches wide x 1.18 inches deep. Weight: 5.3 ounces.
ShortDescription: Helps eliminate viruses, bacteria and germs from your toothbrush.

name: LEVO LED Book Light
Description: The LEVO LED Book Light is a handy book light, a reading light, and a multipurpose light for all sorts of applications. Super bright light is the perfect choice to light up our LEVO BookHolders, and it doubles as a handy portable light to use around your home. Whether you're reading a good book, fixing the kitchen sink, or working on hobbies, this multipurpose LED light will become one of your favorite lights. 28 super bright LED lamps provide enough white light to light an entire magazine. Flexible goose neck allows the light to be positioned where you need it. It's a clip on book light for reading, and it's a handy light that rests on flat surfaces. 3 power choices: AC adapter ? included, plugs into your AC wall outlet, USB Cable ? included, plugs into your PC USB port to light your keyboard or desk; 4 AA batteries ? not included, use batteries for cordless convenience. LEVO LED Book Light Features: Sits flat for desktop use or can be clipped on surfaces. Great for hobbies, nighttime reading, camping and BBQs. Flexible goose neck allows for easy positioning. Easy-on touch sensitive switch. LEVO LED Book Light Specifications: Included: AC adapter and USB Cable. Bulb life: up to 10,000 hours. Weight: 2 pounds.
ShortDescription: Provides enough white light for reading, hobbies and tasks.

name: LEVO Bookholder Stand
Description: The LEVO Book Holder Stand is completely adjustable for your reading comfort. Now anyone can enjoy reading hands-free with this innovative book stand. Using the 6 unique movements you will be able to perfectly place your book in the most comfortable, ergonomic reading position. Whether reclining in your favorite chair, or lying in bed with your favorite novel, this book holder allows you to read at eye-level, effectively reducing neck and back strain to zero, and removes the stress of arched necks and fatigued hands. Patented design allows this book holder to extend from either the right or left side of your furniture. You can even read in bed with your book upside-down. It's quick and simple to adjust, and no tools are required. From 4 pound novels to lightweight paperbacks, the revolutionary design and sturdy construction of the LEVO Book Holder can hold it all. A heavy duty 13 x 13 inch cast iron base with swivel caster wheels lets you easily move the LEVO bookstand from room to room and even makes a great cookbook holder. The page holders spring action and soft rubber ends make turning pages a snap, even with one hand. The telescoping stand adjusts in height from 58?37 inches. The stand tilts around the horizontal axis and moves closer or further away to allow users to position reading materials directly in their line of vision. Users can swing materials out of the way when finished reading. LEVO BookHolder Stand Features: Platform tilts 360 degrees for reading convenience. Books strap firmly to the platform. Telescoping stand is height adjustable 26 to 48 inches. Allows reading at eye-level. Reduces neck strain and soreness. LEVO BookHolder Stand Specifications: Dimensions: 12 inches high x 16.5 inches wide. Weight: 35 pounds. Base measurement: 13 inches x 13 inches.
ShortDescription: A breakthrough in reading comfort!

name: LEVO Desk Bookholder
Description: The LEVO Desk Book Holder easily clamps to a desk or table and places your reading material in the most ergonomically correct height and angle to your line of vision for your reading comfort. It is the only book holder for desks that can hold a 5 pound book completely upside-down! The book board securely holds your book and rotates 360 degrees. Telescoping adjustable height from 4 to 8 inches above the desk (measured from the bottom of the book board). Spring action page holders have soft rubber ends and allow turning pages with one hand. The LEVO Desk Book Holder clears your desktop space so you can take notes, type, or relax with your favorite author. Ideal for limited work space areas. Takes the stress and strain out of having to hold your book. Easily clamps to a desk or table up to 2 inches thick. No more aching arms and stiff neck when you use the LEVO Desk Book Holder! LEVO Desk Book Holder Features: Specially engineered page holders keep book wide open. Improves posture. Reduces pain in neck. LEVO Desk Book Holder Specifications: Maximum desk thickness: 2 inches . Minimum height: 4 inches above desk (measured from bottom of book). Maximum height: 8 inches above desk (measured from bottom of book). Reach: 22.5 inches from pole to middle of book board. Construction Materials: steel, nylon (super strong polymer), and ABS (book board). Weight: 6.7 pounds.
ShortDescription: Helps clear up desk space.

name: SuperPole System
Description: Health Craft Super Pole System is a floor-to-ceiling grab bar. This award winning modular support system provides support and balance assistance to those who need extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position. SuperPole is a secure structure that can be installed in minutes between a floor and ceiling and is held by a jackscrew expansion. The screw expands the pole to create enough tension between the floor and ceiling to hold the pole securely. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling, placing transfer support directly where it is needed. Use it beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair. The SuperPole accessories are also available to meet changing needs: The SuperBar, SuperTrapeze, SuperTray and Safety Island. Note: The SuperPole™ System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. The SuperPole System™ should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes, or in suspended or angled ceilings. Recommended weight limits are 300lbs.All designs and specifications subject to change without notice. Made in Canada © 2007. Health Craft Super Pole System Features: Floor to ceiling pole makes transfers easier. Hand grip provides secure grip. Easy to install. Rubber pads prevent marring of ceiling and floor. Health Craft Super Pole System Specifications: Material: Heavy duty steel 1.5 inch diameter, 90 inches long. Finish: Anti-microbial powder coat white gloss finish. Grip material: Grey, premium high quality grip 20 inches long. Does not contain rubber or latex. Expansion Mechanism: steel jackscrew, zinc plated 1 1/8 inch fine cut thread. Base Plate: 5 inch diameter, non marking base plate rubber, ribbed for better gripping. Maximum Weight Capacity: 300 pounds.(Standard) Pole length (floor to ceiling): 93-99 inches; 7 feet 9 inches to 8 feet 4 inches. Standard Pole Weight: 13 pounds.(18 pounds with hardware)
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Provides support and balance assistance.

name: SuperPole System with SuperBar
Description: Health Craft Super Pole with Super Bar System is a floor-to-ceiling grab bar with a 16 inch horizontal center extension for additional assistance. This award winning modular support system provides support and balance assistance to those who need extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position. The Super Bar unlocks and pivots freely to move with you step by step. The Super Bar locks every 45 degrees for stability during standing and sitting transfers. It automatically locks when released preventing forward or lateral falls, and provides full support when making two or three step transfers. SuperPole is a secure structure that can be installed in minutes between a floor and ceiling and is held by a jackscrew expansion. The screw expands the pole to create enough tension between the floor and ceiling to hold the pole securely. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling, placing transfer support directly where it is needed. Use the Super Pole with Super Bar beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair. It is more compact than a walker in small restricted areas such as washrooms, and is useful for pivot transfers in narrow areas such as between bed and wall, narrow hallways, etc. This transfer aid allows weight shift, moving, standing, leaving or getting into bed, or transfer to wheelchair, walker or bedside commode. In a shower, the Super Pole with Super Bar provides complete support for stepping over the tub wall without reaching for wall grab bars. The SuperBar can pivot away from shower curtains, allowing them to fully close during a shower. For toilet transfers, the Super Bar permits pulling up to standing and can provide leaning support while managing clothing. Please note : The SuperPole System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. Should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes or in suspended or angled ceilings. SuperPole System with SuperBar Features: Easy to use. No reaching, stretching or twisting required. Can be used in a variety of settings. SuperPole System with SuperBar Specifications: Material: Heavy duty steel 1.5 inch diameter, 90 inches long. Finish: Anti-microbial powder coat white gloss finish. Grip material: Grey, premium high quality grip 20 inches long. Does not contain rubber or latex. Expansion Mechanism: steel jackscrew, zinc plated 1 1/8 inch fine cut thread. Base Plate: 5 inch diameter, non marking base plate rubber, ribbed for better gripping. Maximum Weight Capacity: 300 pounds. Pole length (floor to ceiling): 93-99 inches; 7 feet 9 inches to 8 feet 4 inches. Standard Pole Weight: 13 pounds (18 pounds with hardware) SuperBar: Measures 1.5 inch diameter, 16 inch length, locks every 45 degress (8 positions), height adjustable typically 24-38 inches (from floor, with limit of 58 inches from ceiling to top of bar).
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Secure support bar for safe transfers.

name: Elasto-Gel Sinus Mask
Description: The Elasto-Gel Sinus Mask is a microwavable hot or cold therapy mask designed for relief of sinus headaches, sinus infections or post eye surgery. This gel sinus mask is great for those suffering with sinus headaches or may be used as a sleep aid to reduce excessive light for daytime sleeping. Cool the mask in the freezer or refrigerator to be used cold for reducing swelling, numbing an area, and for pain relief. By heating the mask in the microwave, the warm, relaxing gel mask can help to stimulate blood circulation and relieve pain. One size sinus mask fits most. The outside cover has a hole at the top for easily removing the gel pad from the cover for washing. Elasto-Gel Features: Ideal for sinus headaches or light shield for daytime sleeping. Apply gel pack for Hot or Cold therapy treatment. Will not leak if punctured. Microwavable and provides soothing moist heat. Remains flexible and soft at temperatures as low as 20 degrees. Elasto-Gel Sinus Mask Specifications: Made in: USA. Material: Latex free. Size: Universal (one size fits all). Includes: One sinus mask.
ShortDescription: Perfect for sinus pain and sinus headache relief!
MerchantGroup: Elasto-Gel Hot or Cold Therapy Products

name: SuperPole Unifit Extender
Description: The SuperPole Unifit Extender increases the floor to ceiling range on the SuperPole. The extension tube is a must for extra high ceilings. The extender installs between the pole and the top plate to increase the standard height range from 93-99 inches/236-251 centimeters, to 100-120 inches/254-305 centimeters. Increases height of the Super Pole by 20 inches. The Uni-Fit extender is a separate piece that slides over the top end of the SuperPole and has pre-drilled holes to adjust the height properly. The top end of the tube is secured to ceiling anchor plate with a second locking pin. SuperPole Unifit Extender Features: Easy to install. Increases the floor to ceiling height range of the SuperPole from 100 inches to 120 inches. SuperPole Unifit Extender Specifications: Construction: powder coated steel.
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Extends the SuperPole to fit high ceilings.

name: EZGrip Pen Grips
Description: The EZGrip Pen Grips feature an ergonomic design that is aimed at reducing grip pressure for people suffering from decreased hand strength and carpal tunnel. This pen grip allows the use of one fingertip instead of three fingers. The unique design of this grip allows one finger to exert downward pressure for writing and no squeezing is necessary. The pen/pencil with the applied grip is held lightly without falling out or through the fingers. The Pen Grip greatly reduces grip forces needed to write. Can be used on a pencil, pen, scalpel or any other pencil-like instrument. EZGrips are patented and have been awarded U.S. Utility and Design patents. EZGrip Pen Grips are especially helpful to persons with poor grip strength, cramping/dystonia, Carpal Tunnel and any type of grip impairment or for just plain comfort. They are used for finger stress relief as well as prevention of cramping, or other difficulties. EZGrip Pen Grip Features: Helps prevent cramping, stress and injuries. Requires up to 57% less pressure than standard pens. Can be attached to any pencil, pen, scalpel or any other pencil-like instrument. EZGrip Pen Grip Specifications: Material: hypoallergenic rubber compound, latex free. Measurements: 1 1/8 inch in length and 6/8 inch at widest point. Includes: package of 3 (one of each: red, white, blue).
ShortDescription: Allows the use of one fingertip for writing instead of three fingers.

name: Easy On Easy Off Sock Aid Kit
Description: The Easy On Easy Off Sock Aid Kit is designed to assist individuals who have difficulty bending to put on or take off their socks. The Easy On Sock Aid consists of a U-shaped half cylinder mounted at an angle on a flat base. The base has a hook for positioning the Easy Off Sock Aid. To put on your sock, place the Easy On Sock Aid on your lap or between your thighs, place the toe of the sock in the middle of the half cylinder pointing down, and roll the upper portion of the sock down on the outside of the half cylinder. The sock will be inside out down to the foot and open. Then place the Sock Aid on the floor, insert your foot into the sock, and slide the heel down along the half cylinder to complete putting on the sock. The Easy Off Sock Aid consists of a shaft with an end piece that has two prongs with a curved loop in between. To remove your sock, slide the loop end of the tool between the top of the sock and the ankle and push the sock down past the heel with the two prongs catching the cuff of the sock. Then let the shaft drop to the floor and steps on it with the other foot. The foot is removed from the sock, while the sock remains attached to the prongs. Return the Easy Off Sock Aid to an upright position and bring the sock within reach. It can be used to remove light compression garments also. Easy On Easy Off Sock Aid Kit Features: No bending required for putting on or taking off socks. Easy for one-handed users. Unique cordless system. Compact design for storing or travel. Easy On Easy Off Sock Aid Kit Specifications: Included: One Easy On Sock Aid and one Easy Off Sock Aid. Easy On Sock Aid Measures: 9.5 inches long, 4 inches wide, 6.5 inches high. Easy On Sock Aid Weighs: 26 ounces. Easy Off Sock Aid Measures: 18.9 inches long. Easy On Sock Aid Weighs: 12 ounces.
ShortDescription: Cordless system allows you to put on and take off your sock without bending.

name: Granny Jo Dignity Mug
Description: The Granny Jo Dignity Mug is a unique ceramic mug with two extra-large handles intended for those who no longer have the strength or dexterity to hold a mug with one hand. The design of the Granny Jo Dignity Mug permits multiple grip options - the user can either grasp the outside of both handles, slide their fingers through the wide openings, or grip the body of the mug directly. The multiple grip options allow for increased stability and control by the drinker, improving their ability to maintain independence and personal dignity while drinking. Granny Jo Dignity Mug Features: Unique two handled mug. Allows multiple grip positions. Holds 8 ounces. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Granny Jo Dignity Mug Specifications: Dimensions: height 3.75 inches, mouth opening 3 inch diameter, overall width (handle to handle) 6.5 inches. Construction: ceramic. Color: beige.
ShortDescription: Helps those who no longer have the strength to hold a mug with just one hand.

name: Pediatric Universal Weighted Standard Holder
Description: The Pediatric Universal Weighted Holder provides a means to hold a wide variety of writing or marking devices. Use with a pen, pencil, marker or crayon to reduce trembling when writing. Added weight assists in stabilizing the hand for people with Parkinson?s disease or ataxia. Also helps those having difficulty in bearing down with a writing device. To secure the item in the holder, tighten each set screw evenly with the allen wrench that is included. To avoid damaging the item being held by the set screws do not over-tighten. Pediatric Universal Weighted Holder Standard Features: Holds most round or irregular shaped items to 5/16 inches. Helps reduce trembling when writing. Includes an allen wrench and a no. 2 pencil. Pediatric Universal Weighted Holder Standard Specifications: Length: 3.5 inches. Outer Diameter: 5/8 inch. Inside Diameter: 1/8 - 5/16 inch. Weight: 3.75 ounces.
ShortDescription: Helps reduce trembling when writing.

name: Elasto-Gel Lumbar Large/Extra Large Therapy Wrap
Description: The Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap helps give relief to those with minor muscular backaches and pains of the lower back. This therapy wrap is designed to provide moist heat therapy or soothing cold therapy for relief of minor muscular and joint aches and pains. The hot or cold therapy will last 20 to 40 minutes per application. The Elasto Gel pack features hook and loop type closures, which allow the user to move about during therapy. Two sizes are available to ensure the best fit. The Lumbar Wrap is made with Elasto-Gel, a patented gel with exceptional properties for transferring heat or soothing cold. If punctured, it will not leak and will remain usable. The unique combination of four way stretch fabric and tough flexible gel provides an exceptional durable product for use on the athletic field, at home, work or in a health care facility. Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap Features: Can be used for both hot and cold treatment. Contours to the shape of the wearer. Specially selected 4 way stretch outer cover. Tough flexible gel. Retains temperatures for 20 ? 40 minutes. Made in USA. Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap Specifications: Large/Extra Large Size: fits waist sizes 36 - 52 inches. Weight: 4 pounds.
ShortDescription: Helps relieve stiffness and soreness of the lower back.
MerchantGroup: Elasto-Gel Hot or Cold Therapy Products

name: Elasto-Gel Lumbar Small/Medium Therapy Wrap
Description: The Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap provides an ideal therapeutic hot or cold application for pain, caused by injury, tension or muscle fatigue. Unique shape conforms to the contours of the lower back and offers relief of minor muscular and joint aches and pains. It is a deluxe contoured thermal therapy wrap designed to provide both cold compress and soothing heat therapy to the lower back and hips. Specially formulated patented glycerine gel material with exceptional properties for transferring heat. The gel provides moist heat therapy or soothing cold therapy. These remarkable therapy packs are guaranteed to be 100 percent leak proof, even if punctured. Two sizes are available to ensure the best fit. Featuring wide and supportive Velcro strapping, the wrap moves with the user. Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap Features: Can be used for both hot and cold treatment. Contours to the shape of the wearer. Specially selected 4 way stretch outer cover. Tough flexible gel. Retains temperatures for 20 ? 40 minutes. Made in USA. Elasto-Gel Lumbar Wrap Specifications: Small/Medium Size: fits waist sizes 24 ? 36 inches. Weight: 4 pounds.
ShortDescription: Assists in the relief of muscular and joint aches and pains of the lower back.
MerchantGroup: Elasto-Gel Hot or Cold Therapy Products

name: Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar Therapy Wrap
Description: The Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar helps alleviate pain and discomfort from minor muscular and soft tissue cervical injuries, soreness, stiffness and more. Made to specifically mold to the cervical neck region, this wrap can provide either hot or cold therapy relief for the neck and upper spine areas. This neck brace is made of a tough yet soft, flexible gel that is covered with a four-way stretch, soft lycra material. This allows for maximum conformity, heat transfer, and comfort. For moist heat treatment, heat the neck collar in the microwave or a conventional oven. Simply heat the pack according to the included directions. When a warm wrap is applied, heat quickly penetrates muscles and joints. Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar continues to provide heat for an estimated 20 to 30 minutes before reheating becomes necessary. For cold therapy, place the wrap in freezer. The wrap remains soft and flexible at temperatures as low as -20 degrees F. Usually the cold wrap will numb the treated area within 5 minutes without the harsh shock and pain that is sometimes experienced with ice or ice water treatments. The wraps will remain cold for approximately 20 to 40 minutes. Store the Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar in the freezer until ready to use. Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar Features: Microwaveable. Will not leak if punctured. Will not dry out. Conforms to cervical spine curves. Indestructible gel, cover and strap are all latex-free. For Hot or Cold therapy treatment. Elasto-Gel Cervical Collar Specifications: Measurement: 20 inches long, 10 inches wide center, 4 inches at front closure. Straps with Velcro front closure: 2 x 6 inches.
ShortDescription: Helps alleviate pain and discomfort in the cervical neck region.
MerchantGroup: Elasto-Gel Hot or Cold Therapy Products

name: Smart-Rail System Bed Rail
Description: The Health Craft Smart Rail System Bed Rail provides assistance for moving, standing and transferring into and out of bed. This safety bed rail unlocks and pivots outward to provide better standing support with less reaching and twisting. Provides a great solution for those needing help with bed transfers. Attaches to standard beds, not hospital beds or futons. Constructed of strong tubular steel. Easily installs in seconds by inserting the support frame between the box spring and mattress. Safety straps secures bed rail. Simple to unlock by lifting handle. Grey deluxe foam hand grip (does not contain latex). For many, getting in and out of bed can be quite a chore. Unlike fixed-style bed rails, the Smart-Rail Bed Rail is an innovative bed assist rail designed for those requiring a little help for moving, standing and transferring in and out of bed. A simple solution to bed mobility and independence, the Smart-Rail Bed Rail can unlock and pivot out wards to provide better standing support with less reaching and twisting. Top of rail is 30 inches from the floor. Note: VERTICAL LOAD BEARING ONLY. Product intended for moderate vertical weight bearing on rail only. Do not use if side ward (lateral) support is needed. Avoid rail latch unlocking - Ensure that rail is at least 2 inches/50 millimeters off floor when rail is in locked position. (Soft type box spring beds can compress downward under load allowing support frame to move down, and rail to become unlatched). Do not use on wet or slippery floors. Do not use with electric or hospital style beds. Both supplied straps must be installed for secure operation. Product intended for moderate assist with sitting up and standing only. Smart-Rail System Bed Rail Features: Installs in seconds. Provides standing and transferring support. Unique safety latch design. Unlocks and pivot outwards to provide better standing support. Requires less reaching and twisting. Smart-Rail System Bed Rail Specifications: Important Note: this bed rail will not work on hospital beds or futons. Measurement under the mattress: 23 inches. Top of Rail from floor: 30 inches. Support Rail Measurements: 31.5 inches high, 16.5 inches wide, frame 32 x 21.25 inches. Weight Capacity: 250 pounds. Measurement: 16.5 inches horizontally.
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Helps you get in and out of bed with less reaching and twisting.

name: Finger Loop Dinner Fork
Description: The Finger Loop Dinner Fork is equipped with a loop on the handle that slips onto the user?s thumb. The loop helps to stabilize the utensil and guide the user's hand into proper position. This adapted dinner fork was developed by an occupational therapist for people with little or no grip strength. The user places their thumb, or a finger, through the loop and rests the handle in the web of their hand. The handle is dipped in vinyl for a comfortable and secure feel. This stainless steel dinner fork is dishwasher safe. Finger Loop Dinner Fork Features: Vinyl coated handle. Handle loop provides leverage. Dishwasher safe. Finger Loop Dinner Fork Specifications: Loop measures (inside): 1 1/8 inch wide, 7/8 inch high. Fork measures: overall length 7 1/4 inches; tines are 2 inches long and 1 inch wide. Made of: stainless steel with vinyl coating.
ShortDescription: Loop on the handle provides leverage and support.

name: Finger Loop Teaspoon
Description: The Finger Loop Teaspoon is designed with a loop on the handle that helps the user to properly position the utensil in their hand. An occupational therapist developed this adapted teaspoon for people with little or no grip strength. The user places their thumb, or a finger, through the loop on the handle, and stabilizes the handle of the utensil with the web of their hand. The vinyl coating on the handle provides a comfortable and secure feel. Stainless steel teaspoon is dishwasher safe. Finger Loop Teaspoon Features: Looks and feels like a traditional spoon. Handle loop provides greater leverage and support. Dishwasher safe. Finger Loop Teaspoon Specifications: Teaspoon measures: overall length 6 inches; bowl measures 2 inches long and 1 inch wide. Loop measures (inside): 1 1/8 inch wide, 7/8 inch high. Made of: stainless steel with vinyl coating.
ShortDescription: Vinyl coated handle provides a comfortable and secure feel.

name: Silipos Achilles Heel Sleeve
Description: Silipos Achilles Heel Sleeve protects the tender Achilles tendon area while slowly releasing medical grade mineral oil to help soften and moisturize your skin. This protective heel sleeve provides gentle compression and dissipation of pressure around and inflamed Achilles tendon. The soft conforming gel pad protects the posterior of the heel from pressure, impact, and friction. The Achilles Heel Sleeve is an ideal recovery tool for heel and Achilles tendon surgeries. It is also used to prevent discomfort caused by ski boots, skates, cleats, athletic footwear, and boots. It is recommended by medical professionals for people with Achilles tendonitis, bursitis, heel prominences, pump bumps or hardened heel skin. This heel sleeve and gel pad does not create bulk in your shoe like a heel cup or heel insert. It is a lightweight, comfortable toe-less sleeve that can be worn with casual, dress and work shoes. The Silipos Gel contains a medical grade mineral oil which gradually diffuses onto the skin for continuous, soothing relief. It is naturally supple and moist, conforms to the contours of your skin, and stays in place so you can get around and resume your normal activities. Silipos Achilles Heel Sleeve Features: Toeless sleeve molds to the foot for a comfortable, secure fit. Gel pad absorbs pressure and friction at the Achilles tendon. Slips on comfortably without taking up space in your shoe. Silipos gel slowly releases a medical-grade mineral oil. Washable and reusable. Latex free and hypoallergenic materials. Silipos Achilles Heel Sleeve Specifications: Material: nylon, spandex. Made in: USA. Package: one heel sleeve.
ShortDescription: Gel pad absorbs pressure and friction around the Achilles tendon.

name: Adjustable Head Pointer
Description: The Adjustable Head Pointer assists individuals with limited hand use in writing, drawing, turning pages, or activating switches or controls. This adaptive device can also help people with limited verbal communication skills to use communication boards. The head piece consists of adjustable lightweight plastic bands for fitting individual head sizes and shapes. The bands are secured with metal hardware, and topped with a 19 inch aluminum pointer rod. The bands are padded for comfort. The pointer rod is length and angle adjustable in any direction, and is fitted with a removable pencil holder. Adjustable Head Pointer Features: Includes a removable pencil holder. Can be used to turn pages in a book. Head bands are padded for comfort and adjustable. Pointer rod is fully angle adjustable. Adjustable Head Pointer Specifications: Length: 19 inch long aluminum rod. Weight: 8 oz.
ShortDescription: Head-mounted rod can be used for writing, typing, turning pages, or activating switches.

name: Cravaat Dining Scarf
Description: The Cravaat Dining Scarf is a stylish clothing protector that is worn over clothing just like a regular scarf. The Cravaat Dining Scarf is discreet and sophisticated, can be worn flat or tied for a little extra style, and no one will know why someone is wearing it. It was originally designed for seniors, but adults of all ages deal with the problem of food spills. The brushed microfiber material has the soft feel of suede and is stain resistant and machine washable. When something spills, it can just be wiped clean. It can also be washed with like colors, dried in a dryer, and it?s ready to go again. Whether you are dining challenged, dining out or at home, at the table or while riding in a car, train, or plane, or if you just want some assurance that you will complete your meal with clean clothes, this alternative dining aid will help you avoid staining your clothing. Diner Wear created the Cravaat Dining Scarf based on the origin of the cravat worn by French Mercenaries in the 17th Century ? a cloth worn around the neck to protect clothes from food spills, or cover food stained clothes. Diner Wear Black Cravaat Features: Stylish alternative to an adult bib. Stain and wrinkle resistant. Functional and fashionable clothing protector. Diner Wear Black Cravaat Specifications: Made in: USA. Material: Brushed microfiber Color: Black. Measures: 27 inches long, 8.5 inches wide, 17 inches wide when doubled. Fabric care: Machine washable.
ShortDescription: Fashionable alternative to an adult bib.

name: Smart-Rail Leg Extender
Description: The Smart-Rail Leg Extenders are for use with the Healthcraft Smart-Rail Pivoting Bed Rail. Smart-Rail Leg Extenders adjust rail height from 31.5 inches to 34.5 inches. For use with 8 - 12 inch mattresses. Leg Extenders are sold as a pair. Smart-Rail Leg Extender Features: For use with Smart-Rail Pivoting Bed Rail. Adjust rail height from 31.5 inches to 34.5 inches. For use with 8 - 12 inch mattresses. Leg Extenders sold as a pair. Smart-Rail Leg Extender Specifications: Color: White. Height Adjustment: 31.5 to 34.5 inches. Includes: 2 leg extenders.
MerchantSubCategory: Bed, Chair and Couch Standing Aids
ShortDescription: Extends the rail height of the Smart-Rail bed rail.

name: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Heel Sleeves
Description: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Heel Sleeves have a thin gel pad that is anatomically molded to fit the heel. Silipos gel is a triblock polymer gel infused with medical grade mineral oil that continuously moisturizes and softens the skin. Silipos gel heel pads are more effective and last longer than silicone based gels. These lightweight gel heel sleeves are perfect to use overnight to provide relief from dry, hard, cracked skin. They can be used in conjunction with other skin moisturizing creams and lotions. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Heel Sleeves are not recommended when walking and are not for use with shoes. All Silipos products are dermatology tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. One size fit most. Non-returnable hygiene item. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Heel Sleeves Features: Thin gel pads mold to fit the heel. Moisturizes and softens dry, cracked skin. Can be used creams and lotions. Diabetic friendly and latex free. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Heel Sleeves Specifications: Sizing: one size fits most. Package: 1 pair. Made in: USA. Care: hand wash, air dry.
ShortDescription: Mineral oil infused gel provides moisturizing relief for dry hard skin on the heel.

name: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Terry Cloth Gloves
Description: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Terry Cloth Gloves are soft terry cloth gloves fully lined with Silipos gel that releases soothing mineral oils to moisturize and soften hands and nails. The patented gel polymer is encapsulated in lightweight terry cloth providing a warm, plush environment. Use 20 minutes a day to reveal softer, smoother skin. Clinical tests show that the gel used in the moisturizing gloves reduced dryness by 66% after 2 weeks, and 86% after 4 weeks. Silipos gel is a triblock polymer gel that is infused with medical grade mineral oil to continuously moisturize and alleviate dry hands, cracked skin and calluses caused by overuse, seasonal dryness, excessive hand washing or other skin conditions. These gloves provide warmth and comfort for arthritic hands. The abundance of vitamins, nutrients, and essential oils pamper your skin, soothe and soften your hands. Silipos gloves are washable and reusable for up to 40 treatments. Made in the USA. Dermatology tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. One size fits most users. Non-returnable hygiene item. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Terry Cloth Gloves Features: Soothe and soften hands. Fully lined with mineral oil gel. Reusable for up to 40 treatments. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Terry Cloth Gloves Specifications: Size: one size fits most. Includes: one pair of gloves. Material: cotton and polyester. Made in: USA. Care: hand wash, air dry. Color: blue.
ShortDescription: Gel releases soothing mineral oil to soften dry hands.

name: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Elbow Sleeve
Description: Silipos Moisturizing Gel Elbow Sleeve is a stretchable sleeve with gel pad that comfortably contours around the elbow to protect the area from pressure, friction and shear forces. Silipos triblock polymer gel is infused with medical grade mineral oil that continuously moisturizes, softens, and rejuvenates dry, flaky skin. This elbow protector effectively helps prevent elbow ulcerations and provides olecranon bursa protection, lightweight elbow protection, or ulnar nerve protection. All Silipos products are dermatology tested, diabetic friendly, latex-free, washable and reusable. One size fits most. The minimum sleeve circumference is about 9.5 inches (The sleeve will stretch much larger, but measure your arm circumference to ensure it will not be too loose fitting.) The sleeve measured flat is 5 3/4 inches wide and 8 inches long. Non returnable hygiene item. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Elbow Sleeve Features: Guards against friction and impact. Mineral oil softens dry skin. Provides elbow protection. Silipos Moisturizing Gel Elbow Sleeve Specifications: Sizing: fits most arms, left or right. Includes: 1 piece. Made in: USA. Care: hand wash, air dry.
ShortDescription: Comfortably contours around the elbow for protection and softens dry skin.

name: Sock Horse Sock Aid
Description: The Sock Horse Sock Aid helps you put on your socks quickly and easily. This sock aid has rubber grips that help to pull the sock over the heel and up the calf. Unlike other sock aids, your sock will not slip off the Sock Horse Sock Aid. The rubber grips are smooth and do not snag delicate socks or stockings. Simply insert the sock over the rubber tabs, and pull the sock onto your foot. The Sock Horse does not stretch out socks like other sock aids because the sock is not stretched over the outside of the sock aid. By loading the sock onto the inside of the Sock Horse, with just the top of the sock over the tabs, your socks are not stretched out and your skin never touches the plastic. The easy to grip handle has ribbed thumb grips and contoured finger grips. This easy to use sock aid will work with sports socks, knee hi nylons, and many types of knee-hi compression stockings. Sock Horse Sock Aid Features: Long easy to grip handle. Does not stretch out socks. Easy to load for those with weaker hands. Skin never touches the hard plastic. Rubber grips are gentle on even the most delicate socks and nylons. Sock Horse Sock Aid Specifications: Measures: 18 x 4 x 6 inches. Weighs: 0.3 lbs. Color: Taupe. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Helps you put on your socks quickly and easily.

name: Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions
Description: Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions use a medical grade silicone gel designed with a three dimensional layout that helps provide ventilation and protection from skin shear and friction while providing a high level of cushioning. The gel used in Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions remains pliable and soft in extreme temperatures and is water insoluble. This proprietary silicone polymer was designed to mimic the same physical characteristics as human fat tissue. These characteristics make it ideal for use in places where the pad might get wet, like wheelchair seat cushions. Silicone gel won't rot or dry out, will not flow or leak if cut or punctured. It is specifically designed to reduce pressure, impact, and vibration and provide protection from shearing and friction. Unlike other gel pads, these cushions will not retain heat and are odorless. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions are very durable and made in USA. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions Features: Cell design allows air flow. Helps prevent pressure sores. Does not retain heat. Odorless. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions Specifications: Sizes: 14 x 14, 16 x 16 and 18 x 18 inches. Thickness: 1/2 inch. Material: medical grade silicone. Made: in USA.
ShortDescription: Helps provide ventilation and protection from skin shearing and friction.

name: 32 inch Rainbow Reacher
Description: This 32 inch Rainbow Reacher is designed as a light duty and low cost reacher which anyone could use. Perfect for reaching into nooks and crannies, grabbing things you can't quite reach or don't want to touch. The flexible rubber cups and jaw grip small and large items up to 3 pounds. A handy hook and loop strap is included so your Rainbow Reacher will always be close at hand, in the kitchen, office, laundry room or work shop. Weighs only 4 oz. Fingers opens to 4.5 inches with non-latex cups. 32 inch Rainbow Reacher Features: Light duty and low cost reacher. Flexible rubber cups. Handy hook and loop strap is included. Perfect for reaching into any small place. 32 inch Rainbow Reacher Specifications: Holds items up to 3 lbs. Weighs 4 oz. Fingers open to 4.5 inches.
ShortDescription: Perfect for reaching into any small place!

name: X-Large Muff Vest
Description: The Extra Large Muff Vest was designed by the spouse of a stroke survivor. The Muff Vest helps the wearer function better with a disabled arm. The weight of the stroke arm is distributed and effectively supported over both shoulders. The Muff Vest provides arm control and support, even when the user is bending forward. The large front horizontal pocket is opened on both ends, allowing the wearer to support either the left or right arm. Two handy patch pockets offer convenient storage and accessibility for small frequently used items. Constructed of 65% polyester 35% cotton blend, machine washable fabric, with durable reinforced stitching. Hook and loop tab closure back opening. Ideal for hemiplegic upper extremities. Extra Large Muff Vest Features: Provides support for a flaccid arm. Hook and loop tab closure back opening. Fits male or female. Extra Large Muff Vest Specifications: Universal fit: for either left or right arm support. Color: khaki. Size: X Large, fits 200 - 250 pounds.
ShortDescription: Helps wearer function better with a flaccid arm.

name: G-Tube Belt
Description: The G-Tube Belt is intended to be used by people who have a feeding tube that extends from the skin surface. It was designed by a wife who disliked the way her husband?s gastronomy tube was constantly being taped to his body. The G-Tube Belt eliminates the need for clumsy pins and tape, and is by far the most comfortable way to secure all types of enteral feeding tubes including PEG tubes, gastrostomy tubes, and jejunostomy tubes. The G-Tube Belt increases the user?s level of tube control, helps to increase self-care, and helps to minimize the risk of accidental pull-out by combative patients and small children. Using the G-Tube Belt should be done after consultation with a physician. It is recommended that a sterile drain sponge with slit for tube entry be placed against the skin as a buffer. Wrap waist strap around waist and secure to a comfortable fit using the hook and loop closure for adjustment. Slide tube through slit to pouch and position pouch over tube accordingly. Secure tube while not in use by coiling onto pouch face and then close bottom flap securely over tube coil. Care Instructions: G-Tube Belt flannel center pouch and soft elastic fabric waistband are conveniently machine washable. Hand or machine wash with a mild disinfectant and hang dry. Be sure to engage the hook and loop fasteners before washing to prevent lint accumulation. G-Tube Belt Features: Secures Peg Tubes, G-tubes, and most other enteral feeding tubes. Soft, comfortable elastic waist band. Washable and reusable. Eliminates need for pins and tape. G-Tube Belt Specifications: Material: Latex free. Pouch measures: 5 x 5 1/2 inches overall, 4 x 4 inches inside opening. Standard size fits: 30 to 45 inch waist size. Large size fits: 46 to 60 inch waist size. Belt width: 2 inches.
ShortDescription: Holder secures abdominal feeding tubes without tapes or pins.

name: Extra Large Clear Plate Guard
Description: The Extra Large Clear Plate Guard is made of heavy duty clear plastic and fits plates up to 10 inches in diameter. This clear plate guard provides a clear edge for a person to push their food against, and can be used discreetly while dining out. Attach the guard to the plate by stretching open the plate guard, and place the rim of the plate into the "V" shaped groove of the plate guard. This type of attachment prevents food and liquids from going between the guard and the plate. The plate guard can easily be removed for cleaning, and is dishwasher safe up to 125 degrees F. Extra Large Clear Plate Guard Features: Dining aid for people who have difficulty keeping food on the plate. Easily removed for cleaning. Securely attaches to prevent liquids from going between the guard and the plate. Clear guard can be used discreetly when dining out. Heavy duty extra large model resists breaking. Extra Large Clear Plate Guard Specifications: Material: Clear high temperature polycarbonate plastic. Measures: 1 1/4 inches high. Fits: Plates up to 10 inch diameter. Cleaning: Dishwasher safe. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Securely attaches to prevent food and liquids from going between the guard and the plate.

name: Cane Expressions Red Cane Cover
Description: Cane Expressions Red Cane Cover is a decorative, removable cane sleeve that allows you to express yourself, your personality, your outfit, mood or holiday spirit. Cane Expressions Red Cane Cover Features: Stylish stretchy pull-on red fabric cane sleeve. Cover easily slips over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Red Cane Specifications: Length: Sleeve is 27 inches long. Material: Washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Red.
ShortDescription: Decorative, removable red fabric cane sleeve allows you to express your personality.

name: Cane Expressions Zebra Cane Cover
Description: Cane Expressions Zebra Cane Cover is a stylish stretchy pull-on zebra fabric cane sleeve. This fun zebra print fabric cane cover dresses up an old and unadorned cane. Interchangeable fabric cane sleeves allow you to express yourself, your personality or your outfit. Cane Expressions Zebra Cover Features: Stylish stretchy pull-on zebra fabric cane sleeves. Sleeve easily slips over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Zebra Cane Cover Specifications: Length: 27 inches long. Material: Washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Black and white zebra print. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Black and white zebra print fabric sleeve personalizes your walking cane.

name: Cane Expressions Leopard Print Cane Cover
Description: Cane Expressions Leopard Print Cane Cover is a decorative fabric sleeve that slips easily over a standard-sized cane shaft. Fun leopard print fabric offers the cane user the ability to coordinate their walking cane with an outfit, activity or occasion. Fabric cane sleeve also protects the cane from scratches. Cane Expressions Leopard Print Cane Cover Features: Decorative leopard print fabric walking cane cover. Sleeve easily slip over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Leopard Print Cane Cover Specifications: Length: 27 inches long. Material: Made of washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Leopard print, brown and black. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Decorative leopard print fabric cane sleeve.

name: Cane Expressions Beaded Cane Cover
Description: The Cane Expressions Beaded Cane Cover transforms your mobility aid into an eye-catching fashion accessory. This unique, beautiful cover is hand-beaded in a lovely floral pattern. Interchangeable cane sleeves help you express your style and individuality by matching outfits or holidays and activities. Cane Expressions Beaded Walking Cane Cover Features: Hand beaded floral pattern cane cover. Sleeve easily slip over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Beaded Walking Cane Cover Specifications: Length: 27 inches long. Material: Made of washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Floral beaded fabric, black background.
ShortDescription: Unique hand beaded fabric allows you to express your style and individuality by matching outfits or holidays and activities.

name: Cane Expressions Bronze Shimmer Cane Cover
Description: The Cane Expressions Bronze Shimmer Cane Cover dresses up walking canes with stylish stretchy pull-on bronze shimmer fabric. Interchangeable cane sleeve transforms your mobility aid into a fashion accessory. Cane Expressions Bronze Shimmer Walking Cane Cover Features: Helps to personalize walking cane with stylish bronze shimmer fabric. Cover easily slips over the walking cane shaft. Fits both wooden and aluminum canes. Cane Expressions Bronze Shimmer Walking Cane Cover Specifications: Length: 27 inches long. Material: washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Bronze Shimmer.
ShortDescription: Bronze metallic fabric cane sleeve dresses up and personalizes your walking cane.

name: Cane Expressions Silver Shimmer Cane Cover
Description: Cane Expressions Silver Shimmer Cane Cover personalizes your walking cane. This silver metallic fabric cane sleeve adds shine and sparkle to your cane. This pretty cane cover transforms a mobility aid into an eye-catching fashion accessory. Cane Expressions Silver Shimmer Walking Cane Cover Features: Stylish stretchy pull-on cane silver shimmer fabric sleeve. Cover easily slips over the walking cane shaft. Fits both aluminum and wooden canes. Cane Expressions Silver Shimmer Walking Cane Cover Specifications: Length: Sleeve is 27 inches long. Material: Made of washable neoprene and spandex. Fabric Care: Cold wash and rinse, air dry. Color: Silver Metallic Shimmer.
ShortDescription: Silver metallic fabric adds sparkle and shine to your walking cane.

name: Clear Flip Down Half Tray
Description: The Clear Flip Down Half Tray is made of 3/8 inch thick clear break resistant polycarbonate. This wheelchair half tray is convenient and easy to adjust with a simple flip. The double-hinge allows the tray to flip completely over, down and out of the way. The 9 inch long adjustable height bracket mounts on the armrest of the wheelchair. This pre-installed bracket adjusts to different arm rest pad heights, up to 1 1/2 inches high and 2 1/2 inches wide. The tray will clear most wheels so a wheelchair user can self propel without removing the tray. With the tray positioned out of the way, the wheelchair can slide better under a desk or table. The user friendly wraparound shape has a larger cutout. Clear Flip Down Half Tray Features: Provides upper body support. Double hinge allows tray to flip over, down and out of the way. User friendly cutout shape. Wraparound style larger cutout. Clear Flip Down Half Tray Specifications: Tray measures: 22 1/4 inches long and 13 3/8 inches wide overall. Material: 3/8 inch thick clear polycarbonate. Attachment: Pre-installed adjustable height bracket. Choose side: left or right.
ShortDescription: Convenient and easy to adjust with a simple flip.

name: Core C-PAP Pillow
Description: The Core C-PAP Pillow provides proper neck support, comfort and compliance for C-PAP users. The unique shape is designed to accommodate C-PAP masks, hoses and headgear. Core Products has developed this pillow with a quilted side panel which creates a distinct edge that does not collapse, allowing the c-pap mask to comfortably hang over the side of the pillow. The quilted gusset prevents pillow collapse. The Core CPAP Pillow is durable enough to support the head and neck without losing its loft, yet soft enough to sleep on all night. This sleep apnea pillow also works well for oral or dental appliances, people with fibromyalgia and other chronic pain, or during pregnancy. This pillow accommodates both left and right side sleeping. A fitted pillowcase is included. The CPAP Pillow is available in 3 different side panel thicknesses. To choose correct size, measure the distance from your neck to the end of your shoulder: For 4-6 inches choose the petite loft 3 inch height. For 6-7 inches choose the standard loft 4 inch height. For 8+ inches choose the high loft 5 inch height. *Non-returnable hygiene item. Core C-PAP Pillow Features: Improves comfort and compliance for C-PAP users. Helps to prevent mask leaks and pressure point soreness. Core C-PAP Pillow Specifications: Pillow Material: Fiber Case Material: Cotton Includes: one pillow and fitted pillowcase Dimensions: 19.75 inches wide, 14 inches long. Made in: USA
ShortDescription: Unique shape and 3 sizes provide proper neck support, comfort and compliance for C-PAP users.

name: Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray
Description: The Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray features a double hinge that allows the tray to flip completely over, down over the wheel and out of the way. This wooden half tray is made of 3/8 inch thick 7-ply natural birch with a wood grain melamine laminate top layer with a clear lacquer finish. The 9 inch long adjustable height bracket mounts on the armrest of the wheelchair. This pre-installed bracket adjusts to different arm rest pad heights, up to 1 1/2 inches high and 2 1/2 inches wide. When the tray is positioned down, it will clear most wheelchair wheels so the user can self propel without removing the tray. With the tray out of the way, the wheelchair can be positioned at a table. Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray Features: Provides arm support. Double hinge design positions tray down and out of the way. Tray cutout fits around wheel. User friendly shape. Woodgrain Flip Down Half Tray Specifications: Tray measures: 22 1/4 inches long and 13 3/8 inches wide overall. Materials: 3/8 inch thick 7 ply birch with woodgrain melamine laminate top layer. Attachment: Pre-installed adjustable height flip down bracket. Choose: left or right side.
ShortDescription: Double hinge design allows the tray to flip completely over, down over the wheel and out of the way.

name: TriDerma Pain Relief Cream
Description: TriDerma Pain Relief Cream combines two clinically proven pain relievers to provide fast relief for aches and pains. It is ideal for foot, heel and nerve pain, minor skin irritations, cuts, scrapes, arthritis, back ache, sore muscles and joints, and sprains. It also helps relieve itching, burning and pain caused by shingles. This specialized formula contains Lidocaine, plus a unique combination of AP4 ® Genuine Virgin Organic Aloe and Arnica, which are both known to contain anti-inflammatory properties to help relieve discomfort and inflammation. Lidocaine instantly soothes and helps relieve pain without stinging or burning like capsaicin creams. AP4 Genuine Virgin Organic Aloe is a proprietary natural botanical complex. Other active botanicals included are: St. John?s Wort, Amica and Boswellia. Each botanical ingredient was chosen for its natural pain relieving and anti-inflammatory properties which are recognized by the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States. Essential botanicals are added to provide maximum strength pain relief without burning, smell or irritating the skin. It also contains a touch of Menthol for extra pain relief. The light scent disappears quickly leaving no odor or fragrance. This soothing formula is non-greasy, contains no fragrance, no cortisone, and no parabens. It is safe for diabetics. TriDerma Pain Relief Cream Features: Provides immediate pain relief. Safe for diabetics. Non-greasy and fragrance free. TriDerma Pain Relief Cream Specifications: Size: 2.2 oz tube. Ingredients: Cortisone and Paraben free. Contains: AP4 ® Genuine Virgin Organic Aloe, Lidocaine, Arnica, St. John?s Wort, Boswellia, botanical ingredients. Directions: Apply externally to affected area 3 to 4 times daily.
ShortDescription: Fast soothing relief for foot, heel and nerve pain.

name: Granny Jo Adjustable Napkin Clip
Description: Granny Jo Adjustable Napkin Clip features a black nylon cord and a locking slide to adjust the length to the size you need. Two easy to use clips are attached at each end of the cord. With this adjustable length cord you can easily make custom clothing protectors out of dish towels or napkins. The clips are not too difficult to use for someone with weak hands. Granny Jo Adjustable Napkin Clip Features: Use with napkins provided by restaurant Adjustable length allows you to customize bib clip to your size. Granny Jo Adjustable Napkin Clip Specifications: Length: 18 inches. Material: Nylon cord with locking slide. Color: black with grey flecks.
ShortDescription: Handy bib clip helps you avoid embarrassing food stains on your shirt or tie.

name: Granny Jo Jeweled Napkin Clip
Description: Granny Jo Jewel Napkin Clip is made of easy to use clips with a stretchable mono-filament and colored beads. This dining accessory is ideal for the lady looking to add some "bling" to her meal time wardrobe. Napkin clips are a better way to hold a napkin during meals. Instead of tucking your napkin into your shirt, just hang it from this handy clip. This pretty beaded napkin clip works with cloth or paper napkins; also holds eyeglasses. Granny Jo Jeweled Napkin Clip Features: Good way to stay clean when eating out. Pretty jeweled beads add "bling". Granny Jo Jewel Napkin Clip Specifications: Length: 18 inches. Material: plastic beads and mono-filament. Color: multi-colored.
ShortDescription: Pretty jeweled beads add a touch of style to this "make your own bib" bib clip.

name: Easy Grip Jar and Bottle Opener
Description: The Easy Grip Jar and Bottle Opener is a kitchen aid that easily opens jars and bottles. The cat-shaped device has a cone-shaped head designed for opening water and soda twist off bottles. The flexible rubber body is for opening caps and lids of various sizes. A packaging cutter is between the ears and is used for cutting through paper and plastic seals on bottles. On the back is a magnet for storing it on your refrigerator. Gripper Jar and Bottle Opener is a jar and bottle opener designed for use by individuals with grasping or upper extremity disabilities or arthritis. The cone shaped head is designed to allow those with arthritis or joint pain to open bottles and jars easily. The flexible body opens lids of all sizes. The Easy Grip Opener is perfect the the occupational therapist looking for an ADL to help patients open beverages and every day items. Easy Grip Jar and Bottle Opener Features: Open bottle caps with gripping cone. Push Out Cap After Opening. Flexible body grips jars and bottle caps. Cut seals on bottles w/ cutter. Easy Grip Jar and Bottle Opener Specifications: Length: 6 1/2 inches. Width: 4 inches. Depth: 1 1/4 inches.
ShortDescription: Never struggle with container lids again!

name: Granny Jo Pearl Napkin Clip
Description: The Granny Jo Pearl Napkin Clip is perfect for a lady wanting a fashionable alternative to wearing and adult bib. Pretty faux pearls on a stretch mono-filament with two large metal clips easily attaches to napkins or small towels to make a custom clothing protector. The Peal Napkin Clip measures 18 inches long. Granny Jo Pearl Napkin Clip Features: Makes a napkin provided by a restaurant into a clothing protector. Pretty alternative to a traditional adult bib. Granny Jo Pearl Napkin Clip Specifications: Length: 18 inches. Material: faux pearl beads on stretch mono-filament. Color: white pearl beads.
ShortDescription: Carry this in a purse to easily turn a napkin into a bib.

name: Granny Jo Original Napkin Clip
Description: Granny Jo Original Napkin Clip features a sliver toned metal chain. This is the original napkin clip to turn a napkin or hand towel into a clothing protector. If you or your loved one does not want to use a traditional adult bib to protect clothing, then the metal chain napkin clip provides a discreet solution. The two metal clips are easy to use and attach to a napkin or towel. Silver tone metal chain measures 18 inches long. Granny Jo Original Napkin Clip Features: Compact size easily fits in purse. Can use with napkins provided by restaurant. Granny Jo Original Napkin Clip Specifications: Length: 18 inches. Material: metal chain. Color: silver.
ShortDescription: Napkin clips with a silver tone metal chain turn a napkin into a clothing protector.

name: The Planting Stick
Description: The Planting Stick digs a round hole at the right depth and width which forms the perfect hole for planting. This gardening tool is designed to punch holes in difficult soils, such as wet soils, clay soils, ground covered by a thin layer of gravel or landscape fabric. Difficult planting situations in between shrubs or tree roots are no problem for The Planting Stick. Think of it as a stand-up trowel and multi-purpose gardening tool. No more burned out drills or bent and broken trowels. People of all ages, and those with disabilities find this landscaping tool easy to use. The Planting Stick?s shaft and auger are made of steel. At the crook, a foam handle cushions the turning crank. A plastic bearing inserted inside the foam handle keeps it from slipping down the shaft while turning. Topping it off is an easy to grip neoprene ball mounted on stainless steel ball-bearings. This adapted gardening tool is assembled using welded-steel construction, therefore there is nothing that can bend or break, and it is durable enough to last for many growing seasons. By turning the foam handle clockwise while pressing down on the ball, the auger will corkscrew into the ground to dig a planting hole. The Planting Stick also handles other garden chores such as weeding, turning the compost bin and starting holes for posts with ease. The Planting Stick Features: Instantly digs the perfect hole. Highly durable. Effective in compact soils. Works in difficult to reach places. The Planting Stick Specifications: Length: 45 inches long. Weight: 8 pounds shipping weight. Color: Red. Materials: Steel, foam rubber, neoprene. Made in: USA.
ShortDescription: Helps you speed through your next big planting job.

name: Gel Armrest Pad
Description: Gel Armrest Pad is designed for the ultimate in comfort and protection. This medical grade silicone gel can help to spread pressure evenly over a larger surface area. This shock-absorbing 1.5 inch thick gel armrest pad is ideal for wheelchair, power chair or scooter users to rest their arms on while riding. A gel cushion armrest is perfect for those who want a softer and safer way to rest their arms and prevent elbow pressure sores. The Gel Armrest Pad is made with a wooden base and plastic base guard providing a stabilizing surface for cushioning and protection. The neoprene nylon cover can be easily washed. The gel pad will not dry, rot or leak if punctured. The gel pad bolts directly to the armrest tubing and hardware is included. Sizes and lengths are available for a desk length armrest or full length armrest. Gel Ovations Gel Armrest Pad Features: Solid gel armrest pad cushions and redistributes pressure. Gel does not dry, rot or leak if punctured. Wooden base provides extra stability. Washable neoprene nylon cover. Gel Arm Rest Pad Specifications: Includes: One armrest gel pad. Available Sizes (width x length): 2 x 12 inches; 3.5 x 10 inches; 3.5 x 12 inches; 3.5 x 14 inches; 3.5 x 16 inches. Weight: 0.75 lbs. Assembly: Some Required. Fits: Armrest of most standard wheelchairs and mobility scooters.
ShortDescription: Ultimate comfort and protection for elbows and forearms.
